75a1(dkon brtsegs): spos dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par gtor
75a2(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang / spos de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen po gnas par gyur to/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
75a3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
75a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su me tog dag gis gtor bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
75a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag dang / tshangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
75a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi
75a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ bar snang la skyil mo dkrung bcas nas bzhugs par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang
75a8(dkon brtsegs): steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas par snang la 'khod par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par
75b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas par snang la 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas
75b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs rigs kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
75b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa de dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mthong bar gyur to/ /mthong nas kyang
75b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga steng gi bar snang la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs
75b5(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis
75b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar
75b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang ldan pa 'di dag ci sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
75b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhag pa'i lha rnams yin nam 'on te/ 'di dag ma yin
76a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni lha yin te/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir mi'i cha lugs dang rtags 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
76a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan snga na 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sngon chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang / dpal dang /
76a3(dkon brtsegs): skal pa bzang po phun tshogs pa dag lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ma thos pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag slar bsdus so/ /de nas bcom ldan
76a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag the tshom dang bcas yid gnyis dang bcas par thugs su chud nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka gang
76a5(dkon brtsegs): dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa'i mi de dag ni lha'i nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod
76a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ mi gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyang mthong la lha'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mi de dag gi lha'i phun sum
76a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'dod par bya ba yin na gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
76a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i mi de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin
76b1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
76b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yang mthong bas na/ kau shi ka gal te de tsam gyis kyang khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na kau shi ka gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar
76b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag gi rna lam du yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs
76b4(dkon brtsegs): par rnyed pa yin na gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka byang chub
76b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par
76b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar sems bskyed na de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog
76b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba de ltar bzung bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga stong tsam ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
76b8(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong ma lnga stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /
77a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen brgya stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen mkhris kyang
77a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
77a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan to/ /gang dag
77a4(dkon brtsegs): d e las gzhan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan par
77a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ lung bstan nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyis
77a6(dkon brtsegs): brlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/
77a7(dkon brtsegs): ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem
77a8(dkon brtsegs): chem zhing 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
77b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi
77b2(dkon brtsegs): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya
77b3(dkon brtsegs): ste drug pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bod+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /
77b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bdun pa ste go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa/ bam po dang po/
77b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya warma byU ha nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
77b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya ka lan da ka'i gnas 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
77b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su
77b8(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing gus pas rim gro dang / bkur sti byas par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'dus pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba 'dus par gyur ba de 'dug pa stan las
78a1(dkon brtsegs): langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas spyi bo btud de phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/
78a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom cung zad cig mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'tshal na thugs rjes gnang bar mdzad cing bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol
78a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /dpa' chen skyes bu chen po ste/ /'jig rten dag na mtshungs
78a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /bdag ni sems can dag gi slad/ /the tshom cung zad zhu ba lags/ /seng ge'i gdan las ma bzhengs par/ /sku ni phyogs bcu kun du khyab/ /tha dad smra ba thams cad kyis/ /
78a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang bsgul bar mi 'gyur bar/ /mkhyen pa'i gter ni mtha' mi mnga'/ /stobs rnams kyang ni tshad ma mchis/ /bcom ldan stobs ni re res kyang / /'jig rten ma lus sgrol bar mdzad/ /
78a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen la rab gnas shing / /stobs bcu la ni gang gnas pa/ /mi 'jigs seng ge chen po ste/ /rgyal ba bla na med pa'i gtso/ /ma 'dres chos ni bcwa brgyad dag / /de bzhin gshegs
78a7(dkon brtsegs): la mnga' bas na/ /'jig rten rnams ni gsal mdzad cing / /mu stegs rnams ni pham par mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad mtha' med mchog ces bgyi/ /nyams pa mi
78a8(dkon brtsegs): mnga'i 'dren pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /dri med mkhyen pa mtha' med pa/ /mkhyen pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mkhyen pa yul la thogs mi mnga'/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bcom
78b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan legs par bsgom pa na/ /lam la the tshom yod mi mnga'/ /bder gnas 'dren pa chen po la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /chu bo dag ni rab rgal cing / /mtshams sbyor 'ching ba yongs cad pa/ /gdug
78b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs bcom zhing / /nyon mongs gdung ba nyer zhi ba/ /shin du bsil la rab gnas la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /'jigs
78b3(dkon brtsegs): med ye shes bla med dang / /ye shes chags dang thog med pa/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho'i mkhyen pa rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum brnyes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas/ /mngon sum mkhyen
78b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs/ /zag pa thams cad zad gyur cing / /nyon mongs lta ba rab bcom pa/ /bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa/ /mang po dag ni rab tu bsags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos rje la/ bdag
78b5(dkon brtsegs): ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bcom ldan mchog gis mkhyen pa yis/ /'jig rten kun ni gsal bar mdzad/ /chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' mi mnga'/ /'dren pa'i chos kyi
78b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyis/ /'jig rten kun du gsal bar mdzad/ /de slad 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos kyi 'od zer snang ba lags/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen/ /spobs pa dag ni bla na med/ /brtson
78b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /rnam pa lta ba rab spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni mtha' med pas/ /mkhyen pa'i yul la mtha' mi mnga'/ /'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bo la/ /bdag ni the tshom
78b8(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba lags/ /chos rgyal thub pa chen po yis/ /sems can the tshom gcod par mdzad/ /'dren pa la ni bdag zhu na/ /mos pa ji bzhin bkas bshad gsol/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten kun/ /thams
79a1(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag gis rab brtags na/ /de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs med pas/ thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad/ /yon tan rnams la rab gnas shing / /rgyan dang ldan pa'i skyes chen lags/ /
79a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal/ /drang srong nang na gsal ba po/ /dper na gangs ri chen po ni/ /rin chen kun gyis bkod pa'i gnas/ /bcom ldan chos gdan bzhugs pa yi/ /bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin
79a3(dkon brtsegs): no/ //rab yangs brtson 'grus chen po yis/ /yid 'ong sgra ni ston mdzad pas/ /sems can gang dag thos gyur na/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam dag 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mi g.yo mchog lags pas/ /chos
79a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi snang ba ston bar mdzad/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin blo ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dus dang 'khor ni rab mkhyen cing / /gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis/ /chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas/ /
79a5(dkon brtsegs): dus mkhyen pa yi blo ldan lags/ /tshangs skad brtson 'grus chen po yis/ /rnam dag gsung ni bkas bshad gsol/ /char chen sa la babs pa ltar/ /chos kyi rlan gyis khyab par mdzod/ /bcom
79a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'khor 'dus nang bzhugs te/ /kun tu chos kyi char phab nas/ /chos 'di la ni gang re ba/ /sems can rnams ni tshim par mdzod/ /mchog tu bde la rab gnas pas/ /rgyal po ri rab ji lta bzhin/
79a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la sbyin mdzad cing / /mang po rnams ni dga' bar mdzod/ /dpa' chen rkang gnyis gtso dag ni/ /spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /gang yang
79a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu chen po tshad ma mchis/ /'khor 'dus 'thun par gyur ba dag / /thub pa che la brten nas ni/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul chol ba lags/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /
79b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba'i slad du 'dir mchis na/ /'dren pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mnga'/ /ji ltar myur du dbye mi mdzad/ /bdag ni de yi mos pa bzhin/ /zhal du bltas nas zhu lags na/ /bcom ldan thugs
79b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes rab phye nas/ /the tshom rnams ni bcad du gsol/ /bla med chos ni thos gyur na/ /sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lus ni dga' bas khyab gyur nas/ /the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi
79b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bla med gtso/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs mi mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la/ /the tshom cung
79b4(dkon brtsegs): zad yod mi mnga'/ /rab brtson 'dren pa chen po la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bla med the tshom chad pa po/ /chos la the tshom mi mnga' ba/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med la/ /bdag ni the
79b5(dkon brtsegs): tshom zhu ba lags/ /snang ba chen po dpag med dang / /yon tan chen po dpag med dang / /rnam dag mkhyen pa dpag med la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag med dang / /
79b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul mkhyen pa dpag med dang / /phan dogs mkhyen pa dpag med la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang / mtha' dang mtha' med rab tu spangs/ /the tshom
79b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gcod pa la/ /bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal/ /thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol/ /gnang bar mdzad na bdag zhu na/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du
79b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya'i gtso/ /grags chen la ni zhu ba lags/ /gal te thugs rjes gnang gyur na/ /the tshom dra ba bcad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
80a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas deng khyod kyis nga'i zhal du bltas nas sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dis de bzhin
80a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la zhu ba du zhig zhu bar sems/ gal te zhu ba yod na ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// /blo gros
80a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas khyod kyis ni/ /nga la ci zhig 'dri bar sems/ /de bzhin du ni zhus shig dang / /ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /khyod kyis ji skad dris pa bzhin/ /re re nas ni gsal phye nas/ /ji ltar
80a4(dkon brtsegs): mos dang 'thun bzhin du/ /myur du phye ste rab bshad do/ /ngas ni khyod la rab bshad kyis/ /thams cad the tshom med par byos/ /khyod kyis zhus dang 'tsham par bshad/ /deng khyod dus bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin/ /dus
80a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni nges par rab bshad do/ /ji ltar khyod kyi mos pa bzhin/ zhu ba dag ni zhus shig dang / /ngas ni thams cad rjes 'thun par/ /khyod la rab tu bshad par bya/ /deng khyod
80a6(dkon brtsegs): dus su zhus shig dang / /ngas kyang dus bzhin bshad par bya/ /the tshom dra ba bshad pas na/ /the tshom med pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /nga ni chos kyi rjer gyur pas/ /don ni mthar phyin thugs su chud/ /
80a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad dag la yang / /the tshom med pa brnyes pa yin/ /nga ni chos rnams thams cad las/ /mngon sangs rgyas pas bsam dka' yin/ /sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/ /zhus
80a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni ston par mdzad/ /nga ni chos rnams thams cad la/ /thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bas/ /dus bzhin du ni zhus pa la/ /myur du bshad pa mdzad pa yin/ /ngas ni dus bzhin rab bshad cing / /the
80b1(dkon brtsegs): tshom dag ni mi mnga' bas/ /de yi mos pa ji lta bar/ /de yi the tshom gcod par mdzad/ /nga ni rtag tu dus rnams dang / /'khor 'dus pa yi bsam pa dang / /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /
80b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa tha dad mkhyen pa yin/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /'dod pa dang ni 'dod med pa/ /so sor rab tu brtags nas ni/ /de dag gsal bar gzigs pa yin/ /gal te blo dang ldan pa
80b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ /legs pa nyid du sgrub byed na/ /nga yis dus dang sbyar nas ni/ /yang dag chos ston go bar mdzad/ /blo dang mi ldan de dag ni/ /gti mug dag gis rmongs dkrugs shing / /de dag shes rab
80b4(dkon brtsegs): snang med pas/ /yang dag chos la gus mi 'gyur/ /gal te gus pa med gyur na/ /yang dag chos ni tshol mi byed/ /chos 'di thos par gyur kyang ni/ /snang ba chen po'i shes mi skye/ /gang zhig chos
80b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas gyur pa/ /chos la mos shing tshol bar byed/ /gal te chos 'di thos gyur na/ /rab snang ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /theg chen dag la mos pa ni/ /mi yi gtso bo tshol byed pas/ /rab snang
80b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag / /bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes la/ /gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni/ /thos pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /dpag med
80b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la mos dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag / /des ni chos 'di thos gyur na/ /bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /sems can dag ni la la zhig / /byang chub snying po tshol ba dang / /
80b8(dkon brtsegs): bla med 'khor lo bskor 'dod pas/ /mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang / /chos la gtso bor gang 'dzin pa/ /dri med chos ni thos gyur na/ /mos shing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /gal te sems can
81a1(dkon brtsegs): la la dag / /legs par bsgrub par mos gyur pa/ /chos kyi 'od zer snang ba yi/ /bla med chos 'di bstan par bya/ /khur lci rnams ni khyer ba dang / /nan tan bsgrub pa la
81a2(dkon brtsegs): mos pa/ /des ni chos 'di thos gyur na/ /dga' bas kun du khyab par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rab tu mos pa yis/ /dge ba'i chos ni sems byed na/ /de la snying brtse bsam bzhag nas/ /rab tu
81a3(dkon brtsegs): phye nas bstan par bya/ /khyod la sogs la thugs brtse phyir/ /khyod kyis ji skad zhus pa bzhin/ /ngas kyang yang dag nges par ni/ /khyod kyi the tshom bcad par bya/ /ngas ni lo mang stong phrag
81a4(dkon brtsegs): tu/ /thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms shing / /the tshom dag ni bsal bas na/ /khyod kyis mos pa rab tu mkhyen/ /gal te the tshom yod gyur na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /khyod la
81a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan pas na/ /the tshom rnams ni bcad par bya/ /gal te the tshom yod gyur na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ni/ /ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /gal te the
81a6(dkon brtsegs): tshom yod gyur na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/ /nga ni chos la rab gnas pas/ /g.yo ba med pa brnyes pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
81a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la the tshom cung zad
81a8(dkon brtsegs): cig mchis pa deng zhu ba lags na/ ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa 'jigs pa spangs nas yang dag par sems rtse gcig tu sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po bgos nas go cha chen pos rab tu brgyan
81b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mos pa chen po bskyed nas gus par bgyid pa dang / bag yod pa dang bcas pas theg pa chen po 'di la 'tshal nas shin tu rnam par dag pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mtho dman dang / gyo mo
81b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma dang / mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lta ba'i thibs po rnams ma mchis pa/ zug rngu zug pa'i sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yang sa ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba
81b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / bar chad ma mchis pa/ drang zhing gya gyu ma mchis pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shul du zhugs nas lta ba'i thibs
81b4(dkon brtsegs): po rnams bcad pa dang / dra ba thams cad dral ba dang / mun nag rnams bsal ba dang / srid pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams spang ba dang / 'du 'phro ba rnams spang ba'i slad du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs
81b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la gzhol ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di'i slad du zhu ba lags so/ /skyes bu dam pa ji lta bus
81b6(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po ji lta bu bgos na go cha bgos pa des theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas lam chen po 'dis gzhol zhing yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
81b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i bkod pa gang lags pa dang / lam gang la gnas pa dang / chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa la gnas pa gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ chos kyi
81b8(dkon brtsegs): tshul la mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i snang ba skyed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis ni go cha mi spong par theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas nur ba ma mchis
82a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / brjed ngas pa ma mchis pa'i dbang po dang / rgyun chags pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis myur du chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la gsal bar mkhas
82a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams la yang dag par chos ston pa'i slad du sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa dang / ji ltar
82a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba bzhin du ma grol ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'dis sems can rnams la sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
82a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di zhu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa lags na chos gang gis byang chub
82a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
82a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
82a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs shing sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyi sman rab tu mkhyen pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag zhu ba gsol lags so/ /
82a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slad/ /sangs rgyas chos don zab mo dag / /thams cad
82b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing gzigs pa po/ /rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu lags/ /theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /ting 'dzin gang gis gzhol gyur pa/ /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ /de dag zhu ba gsol ba
82b2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /ji ltar skyes bu dam pa yis/ /go cha dpag med bgo bar 'gyur/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas kyang / /ji ltar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dun pa slong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar de la sred par 'gyur/
82b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur/ /ji ltar bag yod ldan par 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /theg chen 'di la gzhol bar bgyi/ /de la 'tshal nas ci bgyid pa/ /dngos po 'di yang bkas
82b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad gsol/ /ji ltar theg chen bteg nas ni/ /byang chub sems la gzhol gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i thugs rjes yis/ /myur du bdag la bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar yang dag mnyam
82b5(dkon brtsegs): lam gyis/ /mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur/ /lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dag / /gcod par bgyid la skyon med 'gyur/ /spyod yul dag ni thams cad las/ /ji ltar bgyis na 'da' bar 'gyur/ /
82b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mnyam pa nyid dag gis/ /'dod chags dra ba dral bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mun nag rab bsal nas/ /ye shes snang chen thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ /ji ltar bgyis na gzhol
82b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar so sor rab brtags pas/ /'ching ba mang po spong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'ching ba spangs nas bde bar gnas/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /
82b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa che las 'da' bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi don la mkhas gyur nas/ /bla med la ni gzhol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu'i/ /dpag med go cha bgo bar bgyid/ /go cha de dag bgos nas
83a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /theg chen la ni 'tshal bar bgyid/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mnyam nyid lam la gzhol bar bgyid/ /bdag gis deng 'dir zhus pa 'di/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas
83a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur/ /go cha bkod pa thob 'gyur dang / /bla med theg pa rab brgyan pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /lam 'di la ni gnas pa dang / /lam
83a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i bkod pa gang lags dang / /chos rnams la ni mkhas gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rnams dang / /chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba dag / /ji
83a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bur ni rtog gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /chos kyi snang ba de thos nas/ /chos rnams thams cad mthar phyin pa/ /bcom ldan 'das
83a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /chos kyi snang ba thob gyur nas/ /go cha chen po mi spong zhing / /de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar byang chub sems
83a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams/ /theg chen 'di la 'tshal nas ni/ /brtson 'grus ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bsam pa dag ni
83a7(dkon brtsegs): rab brtan zhing / /'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis/ /shin du 'dul ba thob 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi/ /tshul la mkhas pas thob par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po
83a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam mi khyab/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ /ji ltar myur ba kho nar ni/ /byang chub snying por bgrod gyur nas/ /su yang skor bar mi 'gyur ba/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor 'gyur lags/
83b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar g.yo ba ma mchis par/ /sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bzhin/ /sems can thams cad kun la ni/ /chos rnams yang dag ston 'gyur lags/ /chos rnams yang dag bstan pas na/ /'khor ba las ni grol
83b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags/ /ji ltar bgyis na sems can rnams/ /gtan du bde ba 'thob 'gyur lags/ /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ /'jig rten 'dren la bdag zhu na/ /thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa po'i/ /
83b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs rjes bdag la bkas bshad gsol/ /chos ni gang dang gang dag gis/ /byang chub sems dpa' smin bgyid pa/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyis/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya mdzad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas
83b4(dkon brtsegs): chos la rab mos shing / /byang chub che la gang lta ba/ /chos kyi sgra 'di thos gyur na/ /lus kun khyab par dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha'
83b5(dkon brtsegs): yas la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing yon tan gzhal du med pa bsags pas
83b6(dkon brtsegs): na chos zab mo 'di la rab tu gdung ba mos par gyur pa dang / bsam pa rgya chen pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/ /
83b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod legs par nyon la shin du yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
83b8(dkon brtsegs): chub la gzhol bar gyur pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
84a1(dkon brtsegs): po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
84a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir go cha chen po bgos pa des sems can rnams yongs su bsdud pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems
84a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams bzod pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams brtson
84a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams bsam gtan rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams shes rab rnam par dag pa la
84a5(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i
84a6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen por bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /yon tan chen po
84a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams
84a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par rab tu bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ /
84b1(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi pho nya dang / bdud kyi las la gnas pa dang / lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dang / lam ya nga bar zhugs pa'i mu
84b2(dkon brtsegs): stegs can gyi bstan pa las rab tu byung ba thams cad dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan dang / mu stegs can dang 'thun pa ji snyed pa dag dang 'thab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/ byang chub sems
84b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar go cha chen po bgo zhing / go cha mi spong par brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas sems can gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te/ bzod pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa rnams spangs
84b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ mi skrag mi dngang / mi g.yo mi 'khrug par byas nas go cha dpag tu med pa dag bgo bar bya'o/ de 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i go cha dang / lta ba'i thibs po thams
84b5(dkon brtsegs): cad gcod pa'i go cha dang / bdud kyi dpung rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i go cha dang / shes rab yang dag par len pa'i go cha dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa sogs pa'i go cha dang / khur lci ba rnams
84b6(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba'i go cha dang / mngon par yid ches pa 'phel bar byed pa'i go cha dang / tshul khrims la gnas pa'i go cha dang / las kyi kun gzhi yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha dang / thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i
84b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi gter gyi go cha dang / thabs mkhas pa'i gter gyi go cha dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i go cha dang / ldog pa dang / 'gyed pa med pa'i shes rab kyi go cha gang yin pa'o/ /
84b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de'i bar du shin du bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs g.yo ba mi spong bar bla na med pa yang dag par
85a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams/ /bsdu phyir go cha
85a2(dkon brtsegs): bgo bar bya/ /sems can rnams ni tshad med phyir/ /go cha bgos ba tshad med do/ /sbyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed/ /sems can la ni phan gdags phyir/ /go cha
85a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /'jig rten la ni phan 'dogs byed/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /
85a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /dar shing bde bar gnas par byed/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /phyir mi ldog
85a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'grub par byed/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /spyod yul dag kyang de bzhin no/ //sems can rnams la phan
85a6(dkon brtsegs): gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /shes rab rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /zag med bla na med pa'i yin/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /sems can
85a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni thams cad la/ /bde ba'i yo byad sbyin dgos pas/ /don de legs par shes pa'i phyir/ /go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams/ /phan pa'i dngos po bya dgos
85a8(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /bsdu ba rnam dag bzhi po yis/ /srid pa kun du 'jug par byed/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nad/ /gnyen po dag ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /sems can la ni sman gtong bas/ /nad rnams
85b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sel bar byed/ /des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /go cha legs par bgos nas ni/ /yon tan rnams kyi tshogs dag na/ /mkhas pa dpag med thob pa yin/ /sems can 'khor ba'i
85b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi/ /nyams thag shin tu mi bde bas/ /bdag gis yongs su bskyab snyam nas/ /go cha dpag med bgo bar bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med rnams/ /bdag gis rnam par dgrol
85b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ /srid lta'i dra bas glags pa dag / /thams cad yongs su bcad par bya/ /gang gis nyon mongs dra ba 'di/ thams cad gcod par gang nus pa/ /brtan pa'i brtson 'grus stobs dag
85b4(dkon brtsegs): gis/ /dpa' bo'i go cha bgo ba yin/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /bde ba'i lam la rab bkod cing / /mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba dang / /bla med bde la dgod par bya/ /gang zhig brtson
85b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po'i stobs/ /go cha 'di ni bgo byed pa/ /bdud rnams thams cad dag dang ni/ /rtag tu 'thab kyang ngal mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig lta la rab gnas nas/ /thibs po dag du gang zhugs dang / /
85b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rgyang pan pa dag pa dag la/ /go cha bgos nas phan gdags bya/ /gzhan yang 'khor ni tshad med pa/ /lam gol dag tu zhugs pa rnams/ /de dag la ni phan gdags phyir/ /go cha dpag med bgo
85b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /go cha chen po mi spong bar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs bskyed na/ /go bgos rab rtags khyad par 'phags/ /sems can khams la rab zhugs te/ /bzod pa la ni
85b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas gyur nas/ /brtan pa'i bzod pa bsgrub byed pa/ /go bgos gong na med pa yin/ /'jigs pa dag ni rab spongs shing / /skrag pa dag ni med par yang / /go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/ /thams cad rab
86a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grub par bya/ /gang zhig go cha rab gnas pa/ /rtag tu yang dag rtogs gyur cing / /rab dben g.yo ba med pas na/ /mi 'khrugs ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta'i go cha rab bgos
86a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /blo dang ldan pas gzhan yang ni/ /sems can skyob pa'i go bgos te/ /bdud kyi go cha gzhom par bya/ /yon tan dpag med go cha dag / /thams cad rab tu bgo bar bya/ /dbang po shes mchog gang zag
86a3(dkon brtsegs): gis/ /bgos nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /khur lci rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ /bla med go cha bgos nas su/ /sems can thams cad yongs bzlas nas/ /sdug bsngal khur las thar bar bya/ /rnam
86a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dad pa 'phel byed cing / /dbang po drug ni rab bsdom pa/ /tshul khrims gang dag ldan pa ni/ /go bgos gong na med pa yin/ /dpa' bo ye shes bsgrub pa la/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas pas/ /
86a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam tshul khrims ldan pas na/ /go bgos g.yo ba med pa yin/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba mang po las/ /rnam dag las ni bsgrubs pas na/ /de phyir go cha rab bgos nas/ /rtag tu 'jigs pa med
86a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ /sems can la ni srid pa'i blos/ /'jig rten las ni phan 'dogs pas/ /thabs ni rab tu rtogs pas na/ /go bgos legs par gnas pa yin/ /thabs mkhas ye shes gang
86a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ byang chub sems dpas rab rtogs pas/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /'ching ba mtha' dag gcod par byed/ /mngon zhen thams cad rab spong zhing / /yid ches rgyab kyis mi phyogs pa/ /go
86a8(dkon brtsegs): bgos blo dang ldan pa ni/ /bla med byang chub bgrod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges par ni/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs gang / /brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas pa/ /brtan zhing phyir ldog mi 'gyur
86b1(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / // bam po gnyis pa// //gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bskal pa tshad med pa nas khur chen po khyer zhing go cha chen po bgos
86b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha de lta bu de ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor ram/ bdud kyi pho nya 'am/ log par lta ba'i thibs po dgon dung ma rungs par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
86b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gzugs med cing bstan du med pa dang / ltos pa med cing mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma spangs pas mtshan ma dang bral ba dang / ming dang yi ge med pa'i phyir ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas gal
86b4(dkon brtsegs): te la la zhig mda'i tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang phog par mi 'gyur la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa thams cad bdud kyi rgyal por gyur la/
86b5(dkon brtsegs): re re la yang bdud kyi dmag rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor dang bcas par gyur pa de dag dus gcig tu mda' rnon po tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang nam yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
86b6(dkon brtsegs): po de lta bu'i go cha bgos pa la rnam par gzhigs pa 'am/ tha na spu nyag ma gcig tsam nyams par byed par mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sems kyis kyang tha
86b7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i 'du shes skyed par mi nus na lus kyis gnod pa bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems rtse gcig tu de dag 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni
86b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud mang po pham par byed cing nye bar zhi bar yang byed la/ go cha de lta bu la gnas shing g.yo ba med par sems can thams cad kyis kyang rnam par 'jig par byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
87a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams kyis blta bar bya ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing shes par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems
87a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go cha chen po bgos pa de dag shes shing mthong ngo / /sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir chos
87a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang mngon par zhen pa mi byed do/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos thams cad la yang dmigs par mi byed de/ de lta bas na sems can rnams kyis mthong zhing
87a4(dkon brtsegs): shes par mi nus so/ /go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni kha dog gi mtshan ma med cing bstan du med pa dang / tshig gi brjod pa med pa'i phyir gzugs dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur la/ tshor
87a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /nang dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ phyi rol dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ nang dang
87a6(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gnyis ka dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ nang yang ma yin phyi rol yang ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ skye mched dang yang
87a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ sa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par
87a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan par mi 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ gzugs dang gzugs med ba'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang
87b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang
87b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang / yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi sa dang yang
87b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ tshig gi lam dang yang mtshungs par
87b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par mi 'gyur/ gzugs kyi rgyu dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
87b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid ma yin
87b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/ chos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan par yang mi 'gyur/ mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ 'ching ba med pa/ grol ba med pa bgrang ba
87b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpe dag gis shes par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i go cha dang ldan pa de dag ni chos thams cad du lta ba yang
87b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par mi dmigs te/ gzugs su lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar yang dag par mi dmigs so/ /tha na
88a1(dkon brtsegs): chos cung zad tsam du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni chos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshungs pa mi ldan pa
88a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin no/ /gzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dang mtshungs par ldan
88a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi mtshungs par ldan pa dang / mtshungs par mi ldan pa de dag thag bsrings pa yin no/ /de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa
88a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni mngon par 'du bya ba med de/ byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma yang med de/ mtshan ma nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gnas kyi mtshan ma med pa/ 'dus pa'i mtshan ma med pa/
88a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ ngo bo nyid du blta ba med pa ste/ go cha bgos pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'o/ /de bzhin du go cha bgos pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes
88a6(dkon brtsegs): su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha yang dag par bgos pa na gang gis go cha bgos pa dang / gang du go cha bgos pa dang / gang las go cha
88a7(dkon brtsegs): bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / bdag gis go cha bgos pa dang / bdag gis go cha bgos par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'dir go cha bgos pa dang / gzhan du go cha
88a8(dkon brtsegs): bgos pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / go cha de lta bu bgos pa'i sems can yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ chos thams cad mngon par 'dus bya ba med pa'i phyir dang / yod pa ma
88b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha bgos pa yin pas lus kyang mi dmigs/ ngag kyang mi dmigs/ yid kyang mi dmigs te dmigs
88b2(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rab tu spangs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gal te chos cung zad tsam la gnas par gyur tam/ gal te chos cung zad tsam la dmigs
88b3(dkon brtsegs): nas go cha bgos sam/ go cha bgo 'am/ go cha bgo bar 'gyur ba de dag ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste/ gal te sems de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur pa na gdod bsam gyis mi khyab
88b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can 'ga' tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin/ bskal pa gcig gi sems
88b5(dkon brtsegs): can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin bskal pa brgya stong dang bskal pa bye ba brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin gyi/
88b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa tshad med pa grangs med pa'i sems can gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas de'i phyir go cha chen po tshad med pa bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni go cha yang dag par bgos pa na sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'i go cha gyon par byed do/ /sems can gyi 'du shes mi skyed pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi 'du shes spang ba'i
88b8(dkon brtsegs): go cha dang / bdag gi 'du shes bzlog pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i
89a1(dkon brtsegs): go cha dang / chos thams cad la byed pa'i 'du shes pa'i go cha dang / mtshan ma'i go cha dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang /
89a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi bye brag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / ngo bo
89a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha gyon par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas
89a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te dngos po med pa la gnas nas go cha gyon par byed la go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dngos po la mi gnas par ye shes chen
89a5(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su tshol ba yin pas de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ /bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du/ /
89a6(dkon brtsegs): go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed/ de lta'i go cha che bgos pa/ /bdud dam bdud kyi mngag pa dang / /bdud kyi
89a7(dkon brtsegs): las rnams byed pa dag / /mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang / /lta ba thibs por zhugs pa dag / /bsam gyis mi khyab go cha 'di/ /des kyang thob
89a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ma yin/ /gzugs med cing ni kha dog med/ /bstan du med cing ltos med pa/ /go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de phyir mig gis blta bya min/ ming med mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan
89b1(dkon brtsegs): ma thams cad spangs pas na/ /go cha bgos pa dpag tu med/ /gal te mda' ni ri rab tshad/ /shin tu rnon po 'phangs na yang / bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /mda' ni rang nyid chag par 'gyur/ /
89b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bdud ni ji snyed pas/ /ri rab tshad ni mda' rnams kyis/ /go cha chen po bgos pa la/ /dus gcig 'ongs te 'phangs na yang / /go cha chen po bgos pa yi/ /spu nyag gcig ni nyams mi 'gyur/ /
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /gang yang phan byed gzhig mi nus/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /lus dang sems ni 'gyur ba med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos la/ /su zhig
89b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgul zhing g.yo bar nus/ /sems bskyed thang cig tsam gyis kyang / /bdud ni mang po pham byed pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab/ /bdud dpung dag ni 'jil bar byed/ /de lta'i go cha che
89b5(dkon brtsegs): bgos pa/ /nams kyang g.yo bar mi 'gyur bas/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /mthong bar nus pa gang yang med/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /go cha mtshan nyid mi shes pas/ /
89b6(dkon brtsegs): de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/ /mig gis mthong bar mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs med cing / /chos rnams thams cad shes pas ni/ /rdo rje mchog dang 'dra bas na/ /de ni
89b7(dkon brtsegs): legs par go bgos yin/ /chos rnams thams cad mi len cing / /sems can rnams ni skyob byed pas/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rjes 'brang phyir/ /de ni legs par go bgos yin/ /go char
89b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pa ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'brang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /de ni legs par go bgos yin/ /go cha bstan par med par yang / /chos ni thams cad gang sbyong ba/ /chos
90a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams tshig dang bral bas na/ /ston par nus pa gang yang med/ /gzugs dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /tshor ba dang yang mtshungs mi ldan/ /'du shes 'du byed rnam shes dang / /
90a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs ldan 'dus ba yang ma yin/ /nang du mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /phyi rol tu yang mtshungs ldan min/ /nang dang phyi rol gnyis gar yang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /khams
90a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / skye mched dang yang mtshungs ldan min/ /khams dang skye mched dag dang yang / /'dus par gyur par yod ma yin/ /sa dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /chu dang mtshungs
90a4(dkon brtsegs): par ldan pa min/ /me rlung nam mkha' rnam shes dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /'dod dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing / /gzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'ang min/ /gzugs med pa'i khams
90a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /thams cad dmigs su med pas na/ /mngon par 'dus byed rnams dang ni/ mngon par 'dus byas med pa dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma
90a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/ /gnas pa med cing 'dus pa med/ /'ching ba med cing grol ba med/ /mtshungs par mi ldan yod ma yin/ /go cha mtha' ni dpag med pas/ /nyan
90a7(dkon brtsegs): thos dag gi sa dag dang / /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sa rnams dang / /chos rnams thams cad kun dang ni/ /thams cad mtshungs
90a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi ldan zhing / /thams cad 'dus par gyur ma yin/ /tshig gi lam ni sna tshogs kyis/ /gang yang rigs par mi 'gyur bas/ /dpag tu med pa'i go cha 'di/ /ngo bo med cing bsam dka' yin/ /
90b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad bdag dang ni/ /mtshungs ldan mtshungs min ldan min pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go cha ni/ /bgrang ba kun las 'das pa yin/ /go cha bla na med pas na/ /'ching ba med cing
90b2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba med/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes mtshan nyid med/ /de dag gi ni mtshan nyid dang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus ba yang ma yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid dang / /
90b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs ldan mtshungs min ldan pa'ang min/ /mtshan ma med pa dag dang yang / /mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/ /go cha bla na med pas ni/ /'ching ba med cing grol ba med/ /chos rnams dag ni
90b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las/ /chos gcig grangs su'ang bgrang ba med/ /chos rnams thams cad dag las ni/ /go cha dmigs par mi 'gyur pas/ /de phyir bla na med 'gyur zhing / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes
90b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod/ /go cha la ni gzugs med cing / /tshor ba 'du shes yod ma yin/ /'du shes med cing rnam shes med/ /phung po rnams kyis bsdus pa'ang min/ /de lta'i dpa' bo gang dag gis/ /go cha chen po 'di
90b6(dkon brtsegs): bgos pas/ /lus dang sems ni mi dmigs pas/ /chos ni cung zad mthong mi 'gyur/ /bsam pa rnams las 'das pa'i phyir/ rnams dag sems la rab gnas shing / /rtag tu zhum pa med
90b7(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /shin du brtan pas go bgos pa/ /de yi sems ni mi sgul zhing / /bskal pa'i tshad ni mi 'dzin pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /
90b8(dkon brtsegs): go cha la ni tshad med cing / /chos dang chos min mi len pas/ /dus kyi tshad ni med pa'i phyir/ /gzhal du med pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'du shes mi skyed cing / /bdag gi 'du shes yod ma yin/ /
91a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes 'di ni shes pa'i phyir/ /'du shes thams cad skye mi 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad shes kyang ni/ /chos de'i 'du shes skye mi 'gyur/ /de ltar go cha gang bgos pas/ /
91a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/ /gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas go cha chen po 'di ni chos gya nom pa'i bkod pa'i yo byad ces kyang bya/ /mchog tu gyur pa zhes kyang bya ste/ rnam par gzhig par mi
91a3(dkon brtsegs): nus pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad dbyer med pa zhes bya ste/ chos cung zad tsam la yang bye brag tu 'byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang go cha 'di lta bu bgos pa
91a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni shes rab chen po'i stobs 'dzin cing theg pa chen po dang theg pa mchog dang mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa dang / yongs su bsdud pa chen po'i theg pa dang dpag tu med pa sdud pa'i theg pa la zhon nas
91a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad theg pa 'dis 'degs par byed kyang theg pa 'di la mi shong ba gang yang med la/ theg pa de yang 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par sems can rnams bde ba la dgod par byed
91a6(dkon brtsegs): cing sems can rnams bde bar nges par byung bar byed do/ /sems can gang nges par bde bar byed pa'i theg pa 'di la zhon pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lus dang sems ngal zhing nyon mongs par gyur par yod
91a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas theg pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa gzhan gyis nges par 'byung bar
91a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa thams cad zil gyis gnod par byed do/ /theg pa 'di ni 'gro ba med pa 'ong ba med pa gnas pa med pa bltar med pa shes pa med pa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs pa phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs pa/
91b1(dkon brtsegs): dbus kyi mtha' mi dmigs pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur cing / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdul mi spong pa/ bltas pa med pa/ thogs pa med pa mngon par
91b2(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa med pa yin pas/ theg pa 'dis nges par 'byung bar bya'o/ /theg pa 'di ni tshad med pa yin te gzhal du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin gyis thogs pa'i mtshan ma med pa yang yin te/ mtshan ma la
91b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /theg pa mchog 'di la zhon pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems la zhum pa med par bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol zhing 'jug par 'gyur
91b4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas 'di lta ste/ dper na mar me dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can rnams kyi snang ba chen por byed do/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang 'od zer gyis stong gsum
91b5(dkon brtsegs): g yi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar byed cing gang gis kyang zil gyis non pa 'am bar chad byed mi nus pas yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas bla na med pa yang dag par
91b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas theg pa 'di ni mun gnag spong bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi nad thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad las
91b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'das shing sems can chen po yongs su sdud pa yin pas dman pa rnams kyi bzhon par bya ba ma yin te/ go cha chen po bgos pa ni ma gtogs so/ /ngas ji skad du 'di ni bskal pa tshad med pa nas
91b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su bskyabs pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la mchod cing rim gro byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ tshogs yongs su dag pa rnams kyis bzhon pa bya ba yin gyi/ nyan thos dang /
92a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas dang de las gzhan pa 'jig rten gyis bcings pa 'jig rten dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang / mu stegs can la mngon par yid ches par byed pa
92a2(dkon brtsegs): dman pa thams cad theg pa 'di'i ming thos par yang mi 'dod na theg pa 'di la bzhon par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gasrungs pa lta bu'o/ /gal te sems can gang la la zhig bsam gyis mi
92a3(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i spyod yul la rnam par rtsen cing theg pa 'di la zhon par byed na smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros
92a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas theg pa 'di ni mtha' med de/ sngon dang / dbus dang / tha ma'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /theg pa 'di ni mtha' yongs su chad pa yin te/ mtha' mi dmigs pas mtha'
92a5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med do/ /theg pa 'di'i mtha' ni tshad med pa'i mtha' yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas theg pa la ni mtha' dpag tu med pas dbus kyi mtha' yang med la spang par bya ba'i mtha' cung zad
92a6(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang yod pa ma yin no/ //de la mtha' spangs pa zhes bya ba ni mtha' zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med pas spangs pa zhes bshad do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtha' la mtha' spangs pa zhes bshad de/ de ni
92a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'di'i mtha' spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /mtha' yod pa ma yin pas dbus kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/ /mtha' yod pa ma yin pas mtha'i mtha' zhes bya'o/ /mtha' yod pa ma yin pas mtha' zhes
92a8(dkon brtsegs): bshad do/ /mtha' de la ni mtha' dmigs su med do/ /dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus kyi mtha' dang / mtha' med pas rgyun mi chad par mtha'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /mtha'i
92b1(dkon brtsegs): sgor zhugs pa'i phyir theg pa 'di de las yang dag par 'das pa yin yang yang dag par 'das pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /blo gros mtha' yas mtha' nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag
92b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' gang yin pa'o/ /tshig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir mtha' nyid mtha' ma yin no/ /des rtag pa'i mtha' spangs na mtha'i mtha' yang yod par mi 'gyur te/ mtha' de'i mtshan nyid mtha' med
92b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ /de la mtha' zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa chad pa'i phyir mtha' las yang dag par 'das shing chad pa dang / rtag par rab tu spangs pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas
92b4(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bcas pa de ni mtha'i sgo gnas par byed kyi/ gang 'jig tshogs la blta ba med pa de dag ni mtha'i sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /mngon par zhen pa med
92b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' de dag ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin gyi slu ba'i tshig srid
92b6(dkon brtsegs): p a gsum po dag na mtha' rnam pa gnyis su rnam par rtog par byed pa yin pas mtha' gnyis po de dag gis yongs su bsdus shing mtshungs par ldan par ma gyur na yang dag par 'das shing
92b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong pa'i phyir mtha' gnyis kyi sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba da
92b8(dkon brtsegs): dung ma spangs pa gang yin de dag ni go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa zhes mi bya ste/ mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen par gyur pas gal te mtha' spong bar 'dod par gyur
93a1(dkon brtsegs): na yang mtha' spong pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' la rnam par rtog par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la
93a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la bzhon pa zhes bya ste/ mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha' gnyis po dag las yang dag
93a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'das nas rab tu bde ba'i theg pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
93a4(dkon brtsegs): gang blo gros chen po'i stobs kyis mtha'i chos la gnas pa thams cad mi spong mi gzhig pa'i thabs la mkhas pas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsdus nas mtshan ma med pa
93a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrubs te/ mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du gyur na sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos kyi snang ba sbyin par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i dbang gis mtha' thams cad yongs su
93a6(dkon brtsegs): spong zhing mtha'i spong ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha' cung zad tsam la yang mtha'i sgo de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/ mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'am/ yid la byed pa
93a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ yid la mi byed pa yang med par chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong de la rab tu gnas shing chos kyi snang ba chen po dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
93a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i phyir ni mun nag dang / spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs pa dag yongs su spangs nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa dang / seng
93b1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas sems can rnams la 'di skad du kye khyed rnams myur du 'dir shog la theg pa chen po rab tu bde ba'i theg pa dang / kha lo bsgyur ba chen po'i theg pa dang / rab tu gzhol ba chen
93b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i theg pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba rab tu ston la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis sems can rnams
93b3(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po gzhon pa la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes sgrogs par byed do/ /blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di dang /
93b4(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi skyed par sems can rnams la byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /theg pa chen
93b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dang go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi bya bar sems can rnams la brgyud cing spel bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang sems can rnams go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon te nges par 'byung bar
93b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang yongs su sdud par byed la
93b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa'i yang sdud par 'gyur bas yon tan gyi rgya mtsho chen po dpag tu med pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
93b8(dkon brtsegs): chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas theg pa chen po 'di ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas tshu rol gyi 'gram dang / pha rol gyi 'gram dmigs su med mod kyi 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis
94a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bteg ste/ 'di nas chos kyi dbyings su phyin par byed pas gnas med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'thun pa dang / go cha'i rjes su 'thun
94a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa
94a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /blo gros mtha' yas 'di lta ste/ dper na chos kyi dbyings ni rdul gyis gos pa med pas gang gis rnam par gzhig pa'am gos par byar med do/ /theg pa chen po 'di yang de bzhin du rnam par
94a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa med cing gos pa med de/ rnam par 'jig pa dang / gos pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /
94a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'di ni thog pa med pas lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad gang gis kyang bskor mi nus shing mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
94a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzhol ba yin pas de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la theg chen pa po zhes bya ba ni bkod pa chen po gang yin pa ste/ bkod pa thams cad gang yang theg pa chen po 'dir mi 'jug
94a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di la yang 'dus byas kyi
94a8(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa zhes bgyi ba lta ci mchis lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros mtha'
94b1(dkon brtsegs): yas de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ da ni 'jig rten pa'i rjes su theg pa 'dir yang 'dus byas kyi bkod pa thams cad rab tu ston par mdzad do/ /blo gros mtha' yas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/
94b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po 'di las byung ngo / /'byung ngo / /'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
94b3(dkon brtsegs): p a'i 'byor pa'i sa la gnas par byed kyang 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur bas 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs re re nas 'jal bar byed cing gzhal nas kyang yongs su
94b4(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar gyur pas nges par 'byung ba'i lam rab tu rtog par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa 'di la zhon par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor ba len
94b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang gnas thams cad du skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing nyes dmigs kyang mthong la nges par 'byung ba yang rab tu shes pas ngas 'dir ma bstan pa'i chos rnams dang / bkod pa gang yin pa de
94b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang theg pa 'di'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang gis chos de dag dang / bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu rtog nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / //theg chen bla na med pa'i theg / /theg pa 'di ni bsam mi khyab/ /gang zhig theg pa 'di zhon pa/ /de dag nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
94b8(dkon brtsegs): brten pa'i gnas chen yin pas na/ /theg pa 'di ni bsam mi khyab/ /mtha' ni dpag med tshad med pas/ /de phyir theg chen zhes bya'o/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /theg pa 'di
95a1(dkon brtsegs): la gzhol byed kyang / /theg pa 'di la 'grib pa med/ /'phel bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can dag ni thams cad las/ /gang zhig theg pa 'di zhon pa/ /bde bar gzhol ba
95a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas na/ /de na sdug bsngal ci yang med/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /theg pa 'di la gzhol byed na/ /drang por 'gro zhing gzhan spyod med/ /lus dang sems ni ngal mi 'gyur/ /
95a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams ni gsal byed pas/ /lha mi lha ma yin rnams kyi/ /theg chen bla med 'di la ni/ /sems bskyed rab tu gzhol bar bya/ /rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi/ /theg pa zil
95a4(dkon brtsegs): gnon gang 'dod pa/ /theg chen bla med 'di la ni/ /sems bskyed rab tu gzhol bar bya/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /gnas pa med cing sngon mtha' med/ /phyi dang dbus kyi mtha' yang med/ /
95a5(dkon brtsegs): thob med mthong ba med pas na/ /dus gsum dag ni mnyam pa nyid/ /ji ltar nam mkha' dag pa ltar/ /theg pa 'di yang de bzhin te/ /nyon mongs dag ni rab tu spangs/ /theg pa 'di ni ltos pa med/ /
95a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrib med thogs pa med pas na/ /thams cad yongs su skyob par nus/ /gzhol bar byed kyang mngon zhen med/ /theg pa 'di ni tshad med pas/ /mtshan ma thams cad yod ma yin/ /rang bzhin dag
95a7(dkon brtsegs): ni mi dmigs par/ /'jigs med bsam gyis mi khyab yin/ /gang zhig theg pa 'di zhon nas/ /'jigs pa med pa thob pas ni/ /de yis sangs rgyas chos dag la/ /sgrib med thogs pa med
95a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /theg pa 'di la gang zhon pa/ /'jig rten kun ni snang byed par/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya stong ltar/ /thams cad du ni gsal bar byed/ /theg pa 'di ni mi 'jigs cing / /zil gyis gnon
95b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas na/ /yon tan tshogs ni dpag med ldan/ /bla med 'di la gzhol bar bya/ /theg pa 'di ni 'jig rten 'das/ /khams dang las ni nges par 'byung / /mun nag dag ni rab tu spangs/ /zag pa
95b2(dkon brtsegs): med la gzhol bar byed/ /theg 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'ba' shig yongs su 'dzin pas na/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams/ /der ni shong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /blo dang ldan pa
95b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig gis/ /bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du/ /thabs mkhas nan tan sgrub byed pa/ /nges 'dod theg pa 'di bzhon 'gyur/ /nyan thos kyi ni tshogs rnams dang / /rang rgyal dag gi tshogs dag
95b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / /mu stegs dag ni thams cad kyis/ /theg pa 'di la gzhol mi nus/ /gal te sems can gang zhig gis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos 'di la/ /thabs mkhas rnam par
95b5(dkon brtsegs): gang rtsen pa/ /theg pa 'di la gnas par 'gyur/ /mos pa dag ni ji lta bzhin/ /khyab pa'i smon lam rnam gzhag nas/ /yang dag lam la rab gnas shing / /bla med 'di la gzhol bar bya/ /
95b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'di ni mtha' med pas/ /dbus kyi mtha' yang yod ma yin/ /mtha' yi mtha' dang dbus kyi mtha'/ /thams cad dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtha' ni dmigs su med pas na/ /theg
95b7(dkon brtsegs): pa che la mtha' yod min/ /mtha' ni thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ /bde bar yang dag gzhol bar bya/ /theg mtha' dag ni dpag med pas/ /dpag med gang yin theg mtha' yin/ /theg
95b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di mtha' ni tshad med pas/ /tshad med gang yin theg mtha' yin/ /theg 'di mtha' spongs med pas na/ /mtha' med gang yin spong mtha' yin/ /mtha' ni gang zhig mi rtog na/ /
96a1(dkon brtsegs): spong ba yang ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /theg pa'i mtha' ni dpag med pas/ /dbus kyi mtha' yang yod ma yin/ /mtha' med mtha' ni med pas na/ /mtha' yi ngo bo ci yang
96a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ /mtha' dang mtha' med mtshan nyid ni/ /mtha' min mtha' yi mtshan nyid min/ /mtha' rnams de dag la yang ni/ /mtha' yi mtshan nyid ci yang med/ /mtha' min la ni mtha' sgor
96a3(dkon brtsegs): bshad/ /theg pa 'di ni yang dag 'das/ /de yi tshad las 'das pas na/ /mtshungs par ldan par dmigs su med/ /ngas ni rtag dang chad pa'i mtha'/ /mtha' rnams de dag thams cad ni/ mtha'
96a4(dkon brtsegs): min par yang rab tu bstan/ /mtha' ni thams cad mtha' med pas/ /mtha' yi mtshan nyid yod ma yin/ /rang bzhin ngo bo thams cad ni/ /de na rtog pa ci yang med/ /mtha' rnams de dag
96a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la/ /rnam par rtog pa gang spangs pa/ /mtha' yod dang ni mtha' med rnams/ /thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'jig rten lta ldan pa/ /des ni mtha' sgor rab ston cing / /mtha'
96a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni rab zhen pas/ /skyabs med par ni gyur pa yin/ /gang zhig 'jig tshogs lta min ldan/ /mtha' sgo rnams la ma chags pa/ /mtha' rnams thams cad mi 'dzin pas/ /snang
96a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /thams cad mtha' ni mtha' min pas/ /mtha' rnams yang dag yod ma yin/ /mtha' yi mtshan nyid thams cad ni/ /de dag yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtha'
96a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad mi len cing / /mtha' dag las ni gang 'das pa/ /mtha' sgo dag la chags med pas/ /'jig tshogs lta bcas spong bar byed/ /gang zhig 'jig tshogs lta ba dag / /
96b1(dkon brtsegs): mi gcod spong bar mi byed pa/ /go cha chen po ma bgos pas/ /theg chen la ni mos mi 'gyur/ /mtha' rnams dag ni len byed cing / /mtha' yi mtshan nyid sngon gyi mtha'/ /phyi ma'i mtha' ni gang
96b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa/ /de dag thams cad rnam rtog yin/ /gang zhig 'jig tshogs lta ba dag / /thams cad rab tu gang spangs pa/ /go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/ /bla med theg pa zhon pa yin/ /mtha'
96b3(dkon brtsegs): sgo rnams la ma chags pas/ /'jig rten blor ni gyur bas na/ /mtha' rnams sna tshogs dag la ni/ /thams cad yang dag 'das par 'gyur/ /des na sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /bde bar yang dag
96b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab rtags na/ /shes rab chen po stobs dag gis/ /chos 'ga' yang ni mi dmigs pas/ /spang zhing bsal du ci yang med/ /rtag tu thabs la mkhas
96b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yis/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong legs bstus pa/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ /mtshan nyid rnams ni rab tu rtogs/ /yang dag chos la rab gnas shing / /chos kyi snang chen thob
96b6(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /chos kyi snang ba de yis ni/ /mtha' rnams de dag khong du chud/ /mtha' ni cung zad tsam dag dang / /mtha' dang mtha' min de dag ni/ /mtshungs par ldan par mi mthong bas/ /thams cad la ni
96b7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med/ /sems can sdug bsngal mthong 'gyur na/ /spro bskyed tshig ni 'di skad du/ /khyed 'dir shog la theg 'di la/ /nges par 'byung bar gyis shes smros/ /skye ba len pa thams cad du/ /chos kyi
96b8(dkon brtsegs): snang ba byed par 'gyur/ /go bgos theg chen zhon nas ni/ /'di nyid rab tu bstan par bya/ /theg pa 'di dang go cha 'di/ /de dag la ni phangs mi bya/ /sems can rnams ni thams cad kyis/ /go bgos
97a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po dang / /rab bde theg pa 'di zhon nas/ /bla med bgrod la dgod par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ /rnal 'byor 'di la gnas gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi
97a2(dkon brtsegs): ni chos dag la/ /myur ba kho nar gzhol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang / /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa/ /dngos po de dag 'dzin par 'gyur/
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa// //gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na go cha 'di lta bu bgos shing theg pa chen po 'di lta bu
97a4(dkon brtsegs): la zhon pas na mtha' rnams las yang dag par 'das shing mun pa rnams rab tu bsal ba dang / /'jigs pa rnams bskyab shing brtson 'grus chen pos sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad
97a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha'i bkod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i bkod pa 'di thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ chos 'di sgom pa na sangs rgyas
97a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag la gus pas rim gro dang / bkur sti byed kyang 'di snyam tu bdag ni go cha 'di lta bu bgos pa'o/ /bdag ni go cha 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag ni chos 'di lta bu thos pa
97a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /bdag ni chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/ /bdag ni chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa ma byung ngo / /de la de'i tshe bdag tu 'du shes pa med pas 'jigs tshogs la lta ba spangs shing bdag tu nga rgyal
97a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yang spangs so/ /sems la mtho dman med cing rnam par rtog pa yang med par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad bsdus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sde snod rab
97b1(dkon brtsegs): tu bsrung ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skad cig tsam du yang sems yongs su skyo zhing ngal bar ma gyur to/ /nga de'i tshe go cha ma spangs shing
97b2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dpag tu med pa la zhon par gyur pas tshe rabs thams cad du bdud kyi dpung dang / bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi dmag rnams bcom zhing pham par byas so/ /lam tha dad par gyur ba tsa ra ka dang /
97b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten brgyang pan dang / pa ri par tsa ka rnam par g.yeng bar gyur bar thams cad dang / gzhan yang mu steg can 'di dang 'dra ba rnams ngas rab tu btul te bde ba la bkod do/ /tha dad par smra ba thams
97b4(dkon brtsegs): cad tshar bcad do/ /mu stegs can thams cad rab tu btul to/ /log par song ba'i sems can rnams theg pa 'di'i dbang gis dge ba'i sdom pa sna tshogs la gnas par byas so/ /sems
97b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la go cha dang go cha'i bkod pa rnam par phye ste bstan to/ /sems can rnams la rab tu bde ba theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu dag bstan pas/ gang theg pa 'di la gnas par
97b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag bde ba'i yo byad thams cad thob par byas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus byas kyi bde ba'i yo byad 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bde ba'i yo byad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal
97b7(dkon brtsegs): po'i bde ba'i yo byad dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thob par byas pa gang yin pa'o/ /sems can rnams la chos 'di bstan par gyur ba na de dag chos 'di la yang dag par zhugs
97b8(dkon brtsegs): pas/ 'phags pa'i rigs su skyes pas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng zhing seng ge'i sgra bsgrags nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol
98a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ /blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas tshul bzhin du so sor brtags shing rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa de dag
98a2(dkon brtsegs): ni chos gang gis rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ma lus par shes shing mthong bar gyur kyang rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
98a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams ni lam yang dag pa la gnas pas tshul bzhin du shes par gyur pa'i phyir dang / yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu zhugs pas tshul bzhin du mthong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul bzhin du
98a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog par yang ma yin rnam par mi rtog pa yang ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dag mnyam pa nyid du shes shing mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
98a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis chos rnams btsal zhing gnyer du yod par mthong ba de dag ni mnyam pa nyid ma yin pas tshul bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i shes pa dang / mthong ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par rtog pa dang /
98a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de dag ni rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa de dag la mngon par zhen cing 'dzin par mi byed la/ mngon par zhen cing 'dzin pa med pas rnam par rtog dang /
98a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa yang yongs su spong bar byed do/ /lam 'di la ni snying brtse ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med/ sgro 'dogs pa yang med/ blang zhing dor ba yang med do/ /mnyam
98a8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi lam yang dag pa la gnas pa ni 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par mi byed pas mi byed pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang / bag la nyal ji snyed pa dag ma lus par
98b1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud cing chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i don la rab tu gnas par byed pas lam yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros mtha' yas lam dang / rnam par dag pa'i
98b2(dkon brtsegs): lam gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi
