236b4(dkon brtsegs): gi 'jig pa de dag la/ /rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong
236b5(dkon brtsegs): du ma chud pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la/ /rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /
236b6(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa la/ /rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gro
236b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ong med pa dag / rtag tu khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/ /mi zad ngo bo nyid la rtag
236b8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas/ /mi zad ngo bo rtag tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod dang
237a1(dkon brtsegs): bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/ /bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmongs gyur pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/ /
237a2(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas/ /bzod pa'i gnas ni rtag tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par
237a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /de ni mi gnas tshul khrims bsgrub mi nus/ /mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par mi bsgrub pas/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad
237a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /des ni mi gnas tshul khrims bsgrub par nus/ /mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par bsgrub pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med
237a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsgrub mi nus/ /zag med tshul khrims mngon par mi bsgrub pas/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med tshul khrims bsgrub par nus/ /zag med
237a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims mngon par bsgrubs pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med shes rab bsgrub mi nus/ /zag med shes rab mngon par mi bsgrub pas/ /
237a7(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /des ni zag med shes rab bsgrub par nus/ /zag med shes rab mngon par bsgrubs pas na/ /des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /
237a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ /mig sod nyid la rtag tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /des ni kun 'dzin ye shes mi skyed pas/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos min 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ /
237b1(dkon brtsegs): mig stong nyid ni rtag par rtogs par 'gyur/ /des ni kun 'dzin ye shes rab bskyed pas/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid rtogs pa/ /des ni kun 'dzin ye shes bsgrub pa na/ /
237b2(dkon brtsegs): bla med ma chags ye shes rab bsgrubs pas/ /mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di la ma mos pa/ /mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag tu rmongs/ /de ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na/ /
237b3(dkon brtsegs): bla med ye shes thob par shin tu dka'/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di la rab mos shing / /mig zad ngo bo nyid ni mngon rtogs pa/ /des ni ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pas na/ /bla med ye shes mngon byed dka' ba med/ /
237b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / /bdag med pa yi mtshan nyid rab shes pa/ /des ni rtag tu chos 'di thos pas na/ /mngon par yid ches the tsom med pa 'thob/ /gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid sems
237b5(dkon brtsegs): shing / /nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo med gyur pa/ /des ni kun 'dzin spobs pa mngon bsgrubs nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed pa/ /'od zer 'byin
237b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab ston cing / /mig stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mchod rten brgya stong rab byas shing / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod
237b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pa bas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed na/ /'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/ /gang gis rol mo brgya stong rab byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel mchod pa byas/ /
237b8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na/ /'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams/ /bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par/ /de bzhin gshegs dang
238a1(dkon brtsegs): tshungs par mchod pa pas/ /mdo sde 'di bzung bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di la tshig bzhi pa'i/ /tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin cing ston byed na/ /de la rgyal ba thugs rjes
238a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po yi/ /gtso ltar gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya/ /nga ni 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong du/ /srid pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas dag ni tshad med pa rnams la/ /mdo sde 'di yi phyir ni rim gro
238a3(dkon brtsegs): byas/ /res 'ga' mar me brgya stong tshad med pa/ /snying po re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad tsam/ /spar nas mdo sde 'di la rang dbang dag /'thob par bya phyir 'dren pa rnams la mchod/ /res 'ga' me tog tsam pa
238a4(dkon brtsegs): ka dang ni/ /su ma na dang mya ngan med pa yi/ /phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas/ /nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /slong du 'ongs pa dag
238a5(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin btang ste/ /res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang / /res 'ga' zag pa khron pa chu mi btang / /res 'ga' glang po che dang bzhon pa btang / /res 'ga' rin chen rta dang chung ma btang / /res 'ga' gser gyi khri
238a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rin chen gur/ /res 'ga' se mo do dang phreng ba btang / /de bzhin bskal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni/ /mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med// // bam po gnyis pa/ nga sngon mdo sde
238a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di yi phyir/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs/ /ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu bsgoms/ /sems can rnams la sbyin pa btang / /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /gtum po dag gis brgyad bkag
238a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /de tshe da ni snying brtse bas/ /de la gnod pa yong ma byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /slong du 'ongs pa dag la ni/ /ji ltar mos bzhin rab gtang bas/ /thams cad rab tu
238b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /gzhal med khang chen rnams la ni/ /rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su phul/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rin chen rnam pa
238b2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / /yid bzhin nor bu rin po ches/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /drin yod rnams la rtag dran pas/ /tha na tshigs bcad gcig mnyan pa/ /
238b3(dkon brtsegs): de la yang ni bkur sti byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /tshul khrims ldan la rab bkur bas/ /tha na 'chag pa'i tshe na yang / /de la rtag tu gus pa bskyed/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /'khor ba
238b4(dkon brtsegs): dag na 'khor ba'i tshe/ /drin ni cung zad yod pa la 'ang / /de la rtag tu drin du gzos/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rnyed pa ma btsal chos ma skur/ /nye bshes sems can rnams la ni/ /snying brtse dag ni rab
238b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bskyed/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /mang thos legs bshad ldan pas na/ /chos la mngon par zhen byed cing / /bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /mi dge'i
238b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni skyes gyur na/ /myur ba nyid du rab bshags pas/ /'phel bar yang ni yod ma byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rgyal po'i bur ni gyur ba na/ /rin po che dang byug spos dang / /spos kyi
238b7(dkon brtsegs): phye ma ji snyed pa/ /dad pa'i sems ni ngas bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bsngos shing phul/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /khri mon btson la snying brtse bas/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang myong ba/ /lus
238b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyin par dang du blangs/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs nas/ /rtag tu dus drug dag gi tshe/ /sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /rtag tu bzod
239a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rab bsgoms pas/ /tha na chung ma dag la yang / /'dod pa'i ser sna yong ma bskyed/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /dbul phongs dag ni thams cad kun/ /bde ba dag ni thob bya'i phyir/ /
239a2(dkon brtsegs): nor dag gis ni phyug por byas/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / /skye dgu rnam pa sna tshogs kun/ /thams cad dag ni rab tu bsdus/ /nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ /thams
239a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kun la phan gdags phyir/ /rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas/ /slong ba dag la yongs su btang / /res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag /gzhan dag gcod du mi gzhug par/ /sems can rnams la
239a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs btang zhing / /yid bzhin du ni tshim par byas/ /nga sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe/ /sems ni rtag tu snyoms pas na/ /tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dang / /tshul khrims 'chal dang ngo tsha med/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
239a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa nas/ /so so'i skye bo'i bar dag la/ /ngo mtshar snyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /gus pas kun la sbyin pa btang / /nga sngon sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ /sems la mtho dma' med pas na/ /sdug bsngal
239a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba mi tshol zhing / /mdo sde 'di la rtse gcig mos/ /res 'ga' yul khams dag tu ni/ /phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing / /klu rnams kun ni rab btul nas/ /dus bzhin char ni rab tu phab/ /
239a7(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /ngas ni tshe rabs dpag med nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir/ /dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spyad/ /bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ni/ /brjod kyang mthar thug mi 'gyur ro/ /
239a8(dkon brtsegs): yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ /yang dag dran pa'i sems skyed la/ /mdo sde 'di ni bshad par gyis/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/ /ma 'ongs dus ni gsal gzigs
239b1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ji lta ba/ /thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa yin/ /dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis/ /bla med ye shes btsal ba'i phyir/ /shin du dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /mdo sde 'di ni gang ston
239b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /gang zag de dang phyogs rnams kyang / /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ /mdo 'di thos nas gang mos pa/ /bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang / /thams cad ma lus thugs su
239b3(dkon brtsegs): chud/ /dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis/ /mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas/ /chos bstan pa la skur 'debs pa/ /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang / /dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis/ /mdo
239b4(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/ /shin du gdung bas du byed pa/ /de kun ngas ni lung bstan nas/ /rgyal ba gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /gang dag
239b5(dkon brtsegs): yid ni dag pa dang / /gang dag gi ni ma dag dang / /tha na mos pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /rab zhi dben la rtag mos shing / /ting 'dzin
239b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rab gnas nas/ /'khor ba dag la ma chags pas/ /tha na bag chags rnams kyang ni/ /gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang / /de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams/ /sems can dag ni gang
239b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis/ /mi bden chos la zhen pa dang / /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas la ni rab mos pa/ /ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu/ /thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ /sems can dag
239b8(dkon brtsegs): ni gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten bde la rab chags pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag /legs pa nyid du mi skyed pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir/ /sbyor ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur/ /su yang rung ba gang
240a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis/ /byang chub sa bon rtogs gyur na/ /gang zag de yis nges par ni/ /rnam dag 'od zer dpag med thob/ /zla 'od khyod kyis 'di lta bur/ /'od zer 'di la sogs pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni re re kun/ /
240a2(dkon brtsegs): so so tha dad nyid du ltos/ /khyod kyis shes rab stobs kyis ni/ /thams cad de ltar rig par gyis/ /gang zhig mi dge grogs spangs te/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten byas/ /tshul khrims rnam dag gang srung ba/ /
240a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od zer sgrub par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis dbang po rab bsrungs la/ /ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs/ /dge ba'i chos ni rab sgoms la/ /sems can rnams ni bsrung bar gyis/ /khyod kyis rtsod pa rab spongs la/ /
240a4(dkon brtsegs): stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis/ /rnyed pa dag la ma gdu bar/ /mang thos legs bshad ldan par gyis/ /khyod kyis rnyed pa dag la ni/ /mi gtsang lta bur blta bar gyis/ /rnyed pa'i dri ma dag gis ni/ /rnam dag
240a5(dkon brtsegs): sems ni spags ma byed/ /rnam par grol ba btsal bar byos/ /bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar ltos/ /chos kyi sgron chen rtag sbar la/ /
240a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun ni snang bar gyis/ /khyod kyi sems ni ri rgyal ltar/ /mi g.yo nyid du rab tu byos/ /kha ngan dang ni brdegs pa yang / /thams cad bzod pa dang du long / /khyod ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/ /dge
240a7(dkon brtsegs): bshes yang dag rab tu byos/ /dman pa'i sems ni yongs spongs la/ /rnam dag las ni rtag tu bsgrubs/ /khyod kyi sems ni brtan byos la/ /bla med chos ni rab tu ston/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di lta bu/ /brtse ba can la
240a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par gyis/ /bla med ye shes gang tshol ba/ /'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed/ /des ni sdig pa rnam spangs nas/ /phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dper na blo dang ldan pa dag /me la spyod par mkhas pa gang / /
240b1(dkon brtsegs): ro rnams sna tshogs sbyin byed kyang / /mes ni sreg par yod mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig blo dang mi ldan pa/ /thabs dag la ni mi mkhas pas/ /me khyer lag mthil gang bzhag pa/ /mes ni rab tu sreg par 'gyur/ /
240b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mi zhig dug dag gis/ /sems ni 'khrugs nas myos pa gang / /me la rab tu bsros na ni/ /de yi rgyu yis sos par 'gyur/ zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /blo dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin du/ /yid
240b3(dkon brtsegs): brten yid ni stong par rig / de phyir 'khor bar gnas kyang ni/ /mig brten mig ni stong rig pas/ /mig la mngon par zhen pa med/ /gal te de ltar rab shes na/ /mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med/ /gal
240b4(dkon brtsegs): te mig nyid stong rig na/ /yang dag ye shes sgrub par 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te mig nyid stong rig na/ /'dod chags dag ni gtan nas spong / /
240b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dag ni med pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang / /ngar 'dzin 'chab dang khro ba dang / /ser sna phrag dog ngo tsha med/ /mi bzod sems ni mtho ba dang / /rgyags
240b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / /g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med dang / /gya gyu la sogs par du yang / /thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad/ /yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/ /mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs/ /zhi ba nyid du rtogs
240b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/ /sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas/ /tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes
240b8(dkon brtsegs): thob gyur na/ /sangs rgyas thabs la gnas par 'gyur/ /thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/ /'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par/ /sgrib pa dag ni gtan spong zhing / /'od
241a1(dkon brtsegs): zer 'byung ba sgrub par ni/ /ngas sngon ma thos ma mthong ngo / /yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas/ /sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spong zhing / /spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba/ /'od zer 'gyed pa
241a2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs tshol zhing / /mdo sde 'di la bslab byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa/ /yang dag ye shes thabs thob 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes gang bsgrubs
241a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis/ /'od zer 'gyed pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhin no/ /mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa/ /dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gang
241a4(dkon brtsegs): zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ /mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa/ /dge slong chos ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /
241a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtha' zad gang rtogs pa/ /rna ba skye ba'i mtha' yang rtogs/ /rna ba skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pas/ /dge sbyong chen po'i chos shes bya/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni yongs su ma shes na/ /mig
241a6(dkon brtsegs): ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni yongs su shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye
241a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /yongs su shes pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni legs par ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i
241a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag kyang / /legs pa nyid du mi shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag
241b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /legs pa nyid du shes 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni mngon sum ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /
241b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum nyid du mi shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni mngon sum shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /mngon sum
241b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rab shes pas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni legs par ma shes na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /yongs su shes
241b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / /mngon sum nyid du shes
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam dag legs par ma shes na/ /rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /legs pa nyid du mi shes bas//
241b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ /gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam dag legs par shes gyur na/ /rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas/ /gang zag de
241b7(dkon brtsegs): yis de lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus/ /yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang / /reg bya chos dang sa chu dang / /me rlung dag gi dngos po dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang /
241b8(dkon brtsegs): khams dang 'jig rten skye ba dang / /sgra dang ming la sogs pa yang / /thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu
242a1(dkon brtsegs): s ems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad bcu po 'di dag mngon
242a2(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rnam pa brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing nyams par mi
242a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam pa dang / g.yo rgyu med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / 'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang / bslu ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / theg pa
242a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mdo sde dam pa dag la mngon par yid ches pa dang / dbang phyugs dang / rgyags pa la zhen cing sred pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang / smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
242a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa shin tu rnam par dang par gyur pa dang / dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'khor rnams la mi rten pa dang / rnyed pa la mi rten pa dang / grags pa la mi rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang /
242a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la sgyu med par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsam pa skyed pa dang / chos la gus pa'i phyir
242a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la shin tu bkur ba dang / mdo sde'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / tshig smras pa dag la mi bden pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsam
242a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba dang / bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs pa dang / dbang po rnams dam du srung ba dang / tshig rab tu brtags pa dang / don dam pa'i
242b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la mkhas pa dang / sa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / gzungs zad mi shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang / lus dang srog la phangs pa med pa dang / 'khor bzhi po dag la rjes su
242b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa yongs su bcad pa dang / 'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med do zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba rnams spangs pa dang / da dung ma bslabs pa dag la gya gyu'i mtshan
242b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mi ston pa dang / gang bslab par 'dod pa dag la ci nus kyis rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang / glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / rgyan dang yo byad kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /
242b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gnyid rab tu spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas la gus pa dang /
242b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i las yongs su spangs pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson pa dang / chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la rten par
242b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la shin du mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / sdig pa'i las mi slong ba dang /
242b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa rnams la the tshom med pa dang / dpes ston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas ston par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la ngal ba med pa dang / mdo
242b8(dkon brtsegs): sde yang dag par bzung ba rnams brjed par mi byed pa dang / rang gi bslab pa mi spong ba dang / pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / spyod pa tshad med pa rnams
243a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub pa dang / chos kyi ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang / srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa med pa dang /
243a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa dag la mnyen po rnam par gzhag pa dag ston par byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /
243a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' yongs su legs par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi ltos pa dang / yongs su spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad
243a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bkod pa dag phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni rnam pa brgyad bcu zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos brgyad bcu po 'di dag ni chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
243a5(dkon brtsegs): chos lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin
243a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos lnga po de dag ni chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang / gzugs yongs su dag
243a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu brgyan pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos gnyis po de dag ni chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi
243a8(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad bcu yod de/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i
243b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam par brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag
243b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal rab tu bcom pa dang / tshig mnyen pa dang / dngos po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po yongs su shes pa dang /
243b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa dang / spyod lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs par ltung ba rnams kyi the tshom rab tu gcod pa dang / mi dge ba
243b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la smod cing chos dkar po rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / byang chub tu sems
243b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom pa dang / bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang / bden pa rnams mngon du gyur pa dang / yang dag pa kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang / the tshom yongs su gcod pa dang /
243b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su bzla bar sems pa dang / srid pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / sems rgya chen po yongs su bskyed pa dang / sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs
243b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu spong ba dang / 'dod pa'i phan pa yongs su mi tshol ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
243b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten 'chos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la gus pa skyed pa dang / theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten cing rim gro byed pa dang / theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg
244a1(dkon brtsegs): pa pa dag thag ring du spong ba dang / phyir rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems kyis
244a2(dkon brtsegs): dbul bar byed pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang / ston pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'gal
244a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang / don zab mo yang dag par ston pa dang / gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /
244a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa la chog shes pa med pa dang / spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / mang du thos
244a5(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa mi rjod pa dang / dge ba'i las yang dag par sgrub pa dang / phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang / lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang /
244a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang / yongs su dang ba skyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang /
244a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang / mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs
244a8(dkon brtsegs): su tshol ba la mos pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas pa dang / rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang / ji tsam rnyed pa de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang /
244b1(dkon brtsegs): khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / bdag gi zla ma yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la snying
244b2(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang mthun par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas la shin du dang ba dang / snod ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang / mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang / gsol
244b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa zhig 'ongs nas ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang / zas la snyoms par gyur pa dang / rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa
244b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid du gtong ba dang / sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyad bcu zhes bya ste/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par
244b5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba thob par byed do/ /de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs
244b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mi zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad rnam dag ye shes ston mdzad lags/ /rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas na/ rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig
244b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med mkhyen pas/ de slad rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags/ /rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na/ /tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa lags/ /bcom ldan sngon ni sems
244b8(dkon brtsegs): can phan btags pas/ /de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags/ /rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na/ /'jig rten tshad med rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig
245a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid stong mkhyen pas/ /de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags/ /kun 'dzin mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/ /de bzhin
245a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen/ /mig gi khyad par dag kyang mtha' ma mchis/ /mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/ /sangs rgyas yi ge
245a3(dkon brtsegs): khyad par sgo mkhyen pas/ /mig stong yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen/ /mig ston yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med
245a4(dkon brtsegs): rab sems pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges pa ston/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs rdzogs pas/ /mig gi 'jig pa dpag med
245a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud/ /mig gis 'jig pa rab tu mkhyen pas na/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/ /ji
245a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce lus yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag dang chos/ /'jig rten skye dang sgra dang ming la
245a7(dkon brtsegs): sogs/ /thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byon/ /bdag
245a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byon dang ldan/ /ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring
245b1(dkon brtsegs): por mi thogs de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por
245b2(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs
245b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /bsam gtan pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan bsam gtan pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de
245b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
245b5(dkon brtsegs): shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /chos sku'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol byon/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /
245b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /
245b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag yid ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs
245b8(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /
246a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan gzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi
246a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag sgra ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs
246a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ldan pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs
246a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /sems can gdul slad srid pa gsum na bzhugs/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sems can gdul mdzad pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de
246a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
246a6(dkon brtsegs): shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'dod chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
246a7(dkon brtsegs): shog / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /
246a8(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /gti mug spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /
246b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod sdang spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje
246b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /zhe sdang gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmongs spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po
246b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /'dod chags gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
246b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa/ /cha mnyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das/ /ji ltar bcom ldan cha mnyam spyod 'das pa/ /bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog /'dren pa 'dod chags dag las yongs
246b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa zhe sdang dag las yongs 'das pas/ /
246b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la shin du phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa gti mug spyod las yongs 'das pas/ /'jig
246b7(dkon brtsegs): rten kun la shin du phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun
246b8(dkon brtsegs): la shin du phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun las shin tu phan
247a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun las
247a2(dkon brtsegs): shin du phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /'dren pa chags sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas/ /'jig rten kun las
247a3(dkon brtsegs): shin du phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /lha tshogs mang
247a4(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /klu tshogs mang po thams
247a5(dkon brtsegs): cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /gnod sbyin mang po thams cad
247a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /dri za thams cad rab tu 'dul mdzad cing / /
247a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin grul bum dpag tu ma mchis pa/ /'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog /de bzhin gshegs
247a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /chos rnams yang dag don ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /yang dag de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal
247b1(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' mkhyen/ /skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal zad la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu zad
247b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mkhyen pas/ /skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i grub gyur nas/ /rgyu zad de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /
247b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten spyod la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten gnas
247b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gnas med rab tu mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten las dang
247b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten rang bzhin sna tshogs
247b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /thams cad kun du 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen/ /
247b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag
247b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen/ /bdag
248a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /
248a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /
248a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /cha mnyam spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /
248a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /
248a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba rab mkhyen pas/ /'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen/ /
248a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab mkhyen pas/ /'jig rten phan 'dogs dpe zla yongs ma
248a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin rab gnas pas/ /khyad par thabs kyi ye shes skyed par mdzad/ /
248a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen/ /bdag kyang
248b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'chi 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i
248b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i
248b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /bla med byang chub yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i
248b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i
248b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes
248b6(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pa chos don rab mkhyen pas/ /sems can dpag med rnams ni go bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
248b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang / /rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig
248b8(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad
249a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas/ /dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la
249a2(dkon brtsegs): ni phan bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs dul bas/ /thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
249a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid shog / de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas/ /'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog /
249a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab bsgrubs pas de la ldog mi 'gyur/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur
249a5(dkon brtsegs): cig / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas/ /rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams gsum thugs rje
249a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i gtsor gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs/ /lha mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams
249a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ /'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /khams
249a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten mkhyen ldan pas/ /'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
249b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pa skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skye zad nyid
249b2(dkon brtsegs): la the tshom ma mchis shog / de bzhin gshegs pas rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /rab zhi de la the tshom ma mchis
249b3(dkon brtsegs): shog / de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas/ /de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin
249b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/ /de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs
249b5(dkon brtsegs): pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen/ /de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skyon zlog de la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon
249b6(dkon brtsegs): dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/ /mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /snga phyi mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog /de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ /
249b7(dkon brtsegs): mig gi rtag chad dag las 'dzin mi mnga'/ /bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ /skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog /gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas/ /des ni 'dod pa dag
249b8(dkon brtsegs): la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin
250a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig zad dang mi zad ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen
250a2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/ /gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa/ /des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/ /de slad 'dod pa dag
250a3(dkon brtsegs): la zhen mi mnga'/ /zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang / /g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang / sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas
250a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas
250a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
250a6(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
250a7(dkon brtsegs): btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/
250a8(dkon brtsegs): 'brug dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing / /ka la ping ka'i sgra phyung bas/ /chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin pa/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /nyi ma stong bas khyad par 'phags/ /rnam par sgra rab dag dang ldan/ /
250b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas/ /thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs
250b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyen pas/ /ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs/ /sems can nad ni legs gso ba/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye bar mdzad/ /
250b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/ /mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen/ /rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas/ /sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /sgra dang ming
250b4(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa nas/ /kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang / /ye shes bzod pa'i bar de bzhin/ /thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/ /mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / /rab zhi dag ni 'khor ba dag /
250b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang rten cing 'brel
250b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung chos/ /chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas/ /rkyen med las byung nyid du gsung / /res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis/ /sdug bsngal gzhi ni ston par
250b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ /res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad/ /res 'ga' tshig ni tshad med kyis/ /rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing / /gang zag srog dang bdag med dang /
250b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can med pa nyid du ston/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/ /tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
251a1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan chos/ /yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang / /rjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas/ /brjod mdzad chos kyang yong mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan yang dag chos srung zhing / /skye dgu rnams
251a2(dkon brtsegs): ni go mdzad pas/ /lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag /gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang / /mos pa dag ni rnam par dag /mi ni mang po tshad med kyang / /the
251a3(dkon brtsegs): tshom dra ba chad par gyur/ /'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs/ /zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig /sred dang nga rgyal ma rig dang / /g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros pa nas/ /sdug bsngal phung po la sogs
251a4(dkon brtsegs): par/ /thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs/ /'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don/ /mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag /de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la/ /sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas/ /grangs ni brgya
251a5(dkon brtsegs): stong mang po rnams/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las/ /de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pas/ /chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang / /brjod pa thug pa med pa ston/ /de bzhin
251a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos rnams kyi/ /rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas/ /ming tshig dang po bar ma dang / /tha ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen/ /tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dag /thams cad rab tu bslabs
251a7(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /don mchog dag ni gya nom pa/ /ston pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ /de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa/ /rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas/ /lce 'ba' zhig la rten pa nas/ /lus sems par la
251a8(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'ang min/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas/ /thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal lta na/ /the tshom dag ni bsal du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mi bzad dang / /
251b1(dkon brtsegs): skye mtha' dag ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang / /'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen/ /bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' bas/ /yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs/ /bcom ldan spyan
251b2(dkon brtsegs): ni thogs mi mnga'/ /de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi/ /sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang / /zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni/ /rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas/ /chos kyi
251b3(dkon brtsegs): don rnams rab phye nas/ /'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ /thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas/ /ci slad 'dzum pa stan par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / /mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen
251b4(dkon brtsegs): cing / /rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang / /brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum
251b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang / /mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing / /nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes/ /grags pa
251b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni phun sum tshogs/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan yun ring bsgom bslabs pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad/ /mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen/ /dri bral rtag
251b7(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par dag / sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams/ /dgongs pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen/ /'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags/ /drang srong chen po mngon sangs
251b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags/ /nyon mongs dag ni rab bsal bas/ /thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis/ /mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs/ /
252a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen ni gang ni slad/ /deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/ /
252a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen/ /lus kyang mi rtag nyid
252a3(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs/ /sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen/ /sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtog /dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /
252a4(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan ro la bdag med mkhyen/ /reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sa la bdag med
252a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ /chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /dngos nyid stong par
252a6(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /phung po stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /
252a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen/ /'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen/ /ming yang mi
252a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag nyid du rtogs/ /lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen/ /rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ /sems can stong par rab mkhyen na/ /
252b1(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med/ /bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen/ /mos pa stong par rab mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /'khor ba
252b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag med nyid du gzigs/ /rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen/ /mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol/ /grags pa khams
252b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum kun du gang / /brgya byin mi yi dbang po dang / /klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang / /skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa
252b4(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa/ /'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus/ /sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang / /chos las sprul te gang byung ba/ /thams cad bcom ldan spyan
252b5(dkon brtsegs): sngar mchis/ /gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags/ /'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni/ /'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni/ /stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na/ /khyim na
252b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni/ /bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pas/ /bcom ldan dgongs pa rab mkhyen gyi/ /rdzu 'phrul
252b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis gzigs ma lags/ /bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/ /ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med/ /rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis/ /ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// // bam po gsum pa//
252b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa/ /thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad/ /chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa stan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems
253a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis/ /gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams/ /mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs/ /sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /gang zhig sngon
253a2(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa las/ /yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa/ /mnyam par dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /
253a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas/ /chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab skyes pas/ /'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan
253a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas/ /bya rgyal dad pa shin du dbyangs rab snyan/ /sgra snyan tshad med rang gi ngang gis 'byung / /ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol/ /tshigs bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis
253a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yis/ /rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod gyur cing / /ku tsi ra yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sgra/ /'jig
253a6(dkon brtsegs): rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa/ /thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/ /skye dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen/ /mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med
253a7(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs/ /'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa/ /ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/ /mig gi byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang / /'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang / /smig rgyu chu bur lta
253a8(dkon brtsegs): bur rab mkhyen pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du yang / /thams cad de
253b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni rig par bgyi/ /rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku/ /mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /sku la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum pa bshad du gsol/ /
253b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa ring / /phyal gyi mtshan ma mi gda' seng ge 'dra/ /lte ba shin du zab cing rked rgyas pa/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs/ /
253b3(dkon brtsegs): ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan/ /g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/ /sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa/ /dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal
253b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa stug la mdzes/ /gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'/ /
253b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad/ /sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad/ /tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra/ /ljags mtshan srid rid zhal ni kun du khebs/ /'gram pa seng ge
253b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra zhing shangs ni mtho/ /thams cad thabs dang rnam dag thugs las skyes/ /ud pa la yi bsung ni zhal nas 'byung / /tsan dan dri dag sku ni kun du khyab/ /sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na/ /rnam
253b7(dkon brtsegs): dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas zhabs mthil shin du mnyam/ /sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur/ /gom pa seng ge glang po che 'dra bas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni yang dag
253b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ /'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan/ /khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rab tu gsal/ /dge ba dag gis skye dgu phan 'dogs pas/ /gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye/ /sor gcig
254a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad/ /sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas/ /mtshan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags/ /gzugs sku yongs
254a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/ /zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin du khyad par 'phags/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /byin pa ri dgas e na ya dang
254a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra/ /sku dbyibs mi rgu seng ge ji lta bzhin/ /'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'/ /phyag mthil mnyam rgyas
254a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag ni pus mo 'das/ /mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing / /kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba/ /rnam dag
254a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/ /mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad/ /rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis/ /de 'dra'i chos ni sgrub par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang gis mthar lta rnams ni rab spangs na/ /bcom
254a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur/ /lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing / /ka lan 'da' ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal/ /lha yi glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa/ /ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/ /
254a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa/ /de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so/ /khyu mchog
254a8(dkon brtsegs): smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad/ /spyan mchog dag ni kha dog mthon mthing 'dra/ /gtsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong / /tshems dkar gtams
254b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan/ /dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs/ /dge ba'i phrin las tshad med dag las skyes/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
254b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sku/ /kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing / /'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso/ /sems
254b3(dkon brtsegs): can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud/ /thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas/ /rig pa gsum dang mngon shes
254b4(dkon brtsegs): drug phun tshogs/ /rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/ /bcom ldan brgya stong snyed 'i mchod pa mdzad/ /de 'dra'i
254b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/ /ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas/ /mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i
254b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mkhyen na/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus/ /'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen/ /rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab/ /ci slad 'dzum pa bstan
254b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gzhon
254b8(dkon brtsegs): nu shin du legs par nyon/ /ngas ni deng 'dir byang chub chos/ /'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo/ /khyod la shin du yongs gtad kyis/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe/ /chos ni rnam par 'jig pa na/ /khyod kyis sems can
255a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni/ /rab tu phyi nas bshad par gyis/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/ /ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ /shin du zab cing gya nom pa'i/ /mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la/ /gang mos gang ni mi mos
255a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing mkhyen/ /sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ /byang chub lam ni rab tshol ba/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing / /mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig dad pa rab
255a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig cing / /'du 'dzi la ni mos 'gyur dang / /nyin mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba/ /mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa dag las ni/ /rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag
255a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ /mos pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /dad pas byin pa chud gzon 'gyur/ /'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la/ /nyes dmigs mang bar thos kyang ni/ /'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas/ /
255a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur/ /chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang / /de la shes rab ci yang med/ /thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi/ /yang dag
255a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' ni gang yin pa/ /shes pa med pas thos gyur na/ /yid ches len par mi 'gyur te/ /skyes bu blun po de dag dang / /lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag /gal te thos par
255a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas kyang / /rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni/ /das ni rab tu smod par byed/ /mi lus thob par gyur mod kyang / /de ni don med chud zos yin/ gal
255a8(dkon brtsegs): te shin du zab pa'i chos/ /'di dag thos par gyur nas ni/ /rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/ /sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur pa/ /de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na/ /gdon mi za ba
255b1(dkon brtsegs): kho nar ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /skyes bu blun po gang dag cig /lta ba ngan pas rab smas nas/ /shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa/ /byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mi dge ba'i/ /
255b2(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas/ /blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni/ /bsten cing gus pa bskyed par bya/ /'jig rten dag ni thams cad na/ /nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod dang / /sems can ngan song gsum por ni/ /
255b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bying bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na/ /nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing / /rang dbang dag ni 'thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag chos ni spong byed cing / /chos ma
255b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa spyod par byed/ /de lta bas na rmongs pa yi/ /skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya/ /ji ltar kha lo sgyur pa yis/ /rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin/ /mi dge las ni byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal bar skye
255b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni/ /rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa/ /ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas/ /rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra/ /chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis/ /byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni/ /
255b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par/ /de ltar khong du ma chud pas/ /'jig rten drang srong la bsten nas/ /dge ba'i grogs po yin snyam sems/ /de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du/ /stong pa nyid ni gang bsgom pa/ /
255b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas/ /chad par lta ba skyed par byed/ /lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra/ /sems kyang rjes su 'gag gyur zhes/ /phal cher kyal ba'i tshig dag la/ /mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing / /
255b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la mngon par zhen pas na/ /phan pa'i don ni ci yang med/ /gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis/ /gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang / /nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams/ /ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed/ /blun po gang
256a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig chos ston pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas/ /skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed/ /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/ /khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa/ /'di lta bur ni lta bar gyis/ /deng
256a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni/ /zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dug pa/ /'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das/ /tshad med gang gA'i klung bye snyed/ /mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing / /
256a3(dkon brtsegs): shin du bstan par yongs bsgoms nas/ /bla med ye shes btsal bas na/ /srid pa dag ni thams cad la/ /sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med/ /mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni/ /rnam par dag par shes pas
256a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ /spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas/ /mngon par zhen pa ci yang med/ /sems can dag ni tshad med la/ /phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir/ /bla med 'od zer ston pa yi/ /mdo sde dag ni ston par byed/ /skyes
256a5(dkon brtsegs): bu blun po gang yin pa/ /chos 'di slob par mi nus pas/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa dag la ni/ /skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed/ /de lta bas na blun po dag /thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas/ /de dag la ni
256a6(dkon brtsegs): bsten mi bya/ /de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /rtsod pa'i smra la mos pas na/ /rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la/ /nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas/ /skyes bu de dag rnams la ni/ /
256a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med/ /de lta bas na de dag la/ /bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod/ /skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/ /le lo snyoms las la gnas pas/ /rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /
256a8(dkon brtsegs): mi dge las ni spyod pas na/ /de la tshul khrims dag pa dang / /shes rab mang thos ci yang med/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing / /'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed/ /khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de/ /
256b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni/ /dman pa yin par rab tu ltos/ /khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing / /byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la/ /gang te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang / /lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur/ /
256b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas/ /yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo gros dag dang mi ldan pas/ /tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus/ /rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang / /de la mos pa skyed mi 'gyur/ /
256b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i/ /tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa/ /thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin/ /so so'i skye bos 'di dag la/ /shin du zhen cing chags
256b4(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yang / /rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed kyang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed/ /kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang / /lus kyis chos min
256b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod par byed/ /rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang / /rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni/ /kha dog sgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag gis/ /gos
256b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang / /nga rgyal dang ni bag med pa'i/ /sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed/ /dad pas byin pa ci zos pa/ /thu lum 'bar ba med pa 'dra/ /de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/ /'dod pa lnga yi
256b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'ang med/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la/ /mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas/ /spyod pa 'dren ma mos byed pas/ /mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur/ /yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kyang
256b8(dkon brtsegs): ni dag mi 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni/ /'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang / /dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag /seng ge'i khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin/ /de ltar rab tu zhi ba yi/ /chos ni yang dag bstan
257a1(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang / /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i don/ /rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas/ /'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang / /khengs pa'i sems ni skyed par byed/ /ston pa chen po mi dran pas/ /ngo tsha
257a2(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'i sems kyang med/ /mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang / /yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin/ /shin du dga' bas 'dzin byed pas/ /sems kyis chung zad stong mi byed/ /'di lta bu yi ma rabs
257a3(dkon brtsegs): dag / khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni/ /spyod lam dag kyang srung ba dang / /chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang / /cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na/ /yang dag shes rab ci yang med/ /kha spu dag ni bregs gyur
257a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing / /dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos/ /log lta dag tu lhung gyur na/ /rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dge sbyong sngon du bya ba yi/ /
257a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mi 'gyur/ /ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni/ /rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing / /rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang / /skyes bu blon po
257a6(dkon brtsegs): blo med pas/ /yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur/ /sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa/ /de dag thams cad mi dge yin/ /rnyed pa 'dod pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag
257a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'/ /lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas/ /rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag /sgrub pa la ni mos par byed/ /dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu/ /lo ni
257a8(dkon brtsegs): mang por gnas byed kyang / /phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das lam stong bas na/ /nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gi/ 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur/ /yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing / /
257b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas/ /gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan pa/ /de la shin du sred par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni/ /rtag tu sred pa skyed par byed/ /gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang / /nga rgyal
257b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ston byed cing / /lus kyi las ni mi srung bas/ /spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed/ /res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas ni/ /rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du/ /dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag na/ /ri phug dag ni gang yod
257b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /de ni bdag gi gnas yin te/ /mtho dma' ran par lta ba dang / /'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes/ /tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de/ /dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas/ /
257b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ /phan tshun du ni 'di skad du/ /dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa/ /yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer/ /res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na/ /gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe/ /gal te gzhan dag
257b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs gyur na/ /'di lta bur ni ston par byed/ /bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu/ /nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce 'am/ /yang na rtswa 'jam bting nas ni/ /'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer/ /res 'ga' grong khyer
257b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs gyur nas/ /khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe/ /g.yo sgyus nan tan 'di skad du/ /bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed/ /'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam/ /rgyal po chos rkun la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs dag ni rjod par byed/ /
257b7(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' chags pa'i sems dag gis/ /bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu/ /thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi yon tan rjod par byed/ /bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /bsod nams zhing ni chen po byed/ /
257b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas/ /rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin/ /btsun mo dang ni slas rnams kyang / /mtho ris skyes par gyur ces zer/ /de dag de skad thos nas ni/ /shin du gus pa rab bskyed de/ /gos zas dang ni btung bdag /
258a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed/ /btsun pas thugs rjer rab dgongs shing / /bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer/ /ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing / /nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas/ /bdud kyis
258a2(dkon brtsegs): glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te/ /ru sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra/ /dgon par gnas pa dag la yang / /rnyed pa dag gis snyems par byed/ /dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la/ /brnyas shing skur pa 'debs par byed/ /rnyed dang grags pas
258a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rmongs pas/ /yang nas yang du zhen pa skyed/ /lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na/ /lus dang ngag gi mi dge las/ /yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed/ /gal te sbyin dag dad pa yis/ /dang
258a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyis mchod na yang / /le lo snyoms las dbang gis ni/ /de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed/ /skyes bu blun po de dag ni/ /rtag tu mi dge 'dod bskyed pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la/ /rjes 'thun bzod sems
258a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gang dag nga yi bstan pa las/ /nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas/ /nan tan bag yod sgrub byed na/ /chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur/ /rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang / /bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs/ /
258a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang / /phung po rma yi 'du shes dang / /zas ni rma bskus 'du shes pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gos bzangs dag ni
258a7(dkon brtsegs): thob gyur kyang / /dregs pa dag ni mi skyed cing / /ngo tsha dgab pa'i phyir gyon pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gzugs dang stobs ni mi snyems shing / /zas la chags pa med pa dang / /srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba/ /chos 'di
258a8(dkon brtsegs): thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /sred pa rnams ni stong shes nas/ /'dod pa dag la blang dor med/ /rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du/ /gcig pu 'dug gnas mnyam bzhag
258b1(dkon brtsegs): cing / /'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/ /mi zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing / /mig gtsang lam ni rab sgrub pa/ /chos 'di thob par dka' mi
258b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /dge slong dag ni tshad med snyed/ /brtson pa dang ni le lo can/ /thams
258b3(dkon brtsegs): cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag /sgrub pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/ /yid ches pa dang yid mi ches/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag /mig zad lam ni gang yin pa/ /sgrub
258b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing / /zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni/ /dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa/ /thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/ /gang zhig chos 'di
258b5(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur nas/ /mos pa'i sems ni gang rnyed pa/ /gal te nyams par gyur na yang / /slar ni dang ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /bag med spong bar mi byed pa/ /mdo 'di sangs rgyas bka' ma yin/ /de snyam du ni
258b6(dkon brtsegs): sems par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba/ /dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang / /phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos la ma mos pa/ /mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol/ /grong
258b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer grong rdal rab rgyu zhing / /gzungs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang / /de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang / /'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba/ /brjod pa
258b8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rtogs byed pas/ /stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs/ /dran dang shes rab sems med pas/ /tshe tshad rab tu don med 'das/ /blun po stong pa'i chos spong ba/ /de ni tshul khrims bgegs byas pas/ /mnar med dag tu ltung bar
259a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /nam yang mtho ris yong mi skye/ /gang gis skad cig gcig la ni/ /mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /tshig bzhi tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags/ /me tog phreng ba brgya
259a2(dkon brtsegs): stong dag / sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /tshig bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'phags/ /gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag /gang gA'i bye snyed byas pa bas/ /gang gis tha na skad
259a3(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya/ /me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas/ /gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /chos gos 'bum
259a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya mang po/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba las/ /gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/ /mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dag 'phags/ /mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med/ /gang gis mdo
259a5(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di mos na/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur/ /'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshe/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung / /nga ni bram ze'i khye 'ur gyur/ /me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas/ /shAg kya thub pa zhes bya ba/ /
259a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub snying po la 'dug nas/ /mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes/ /nga la byang chub lung yang bstan/ /khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur/ /nga lung bstan pa thos gyur nas/ /dga' zhing dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du/ /
259a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe/ /bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang / /chos kyi sde snod rab 'dzin cing / /srung bar shog ces smon lam btab/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis/ /
