259a8(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe/ /bram ze'i khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis/ /legs par mnyan cing yongs su bzung / /nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /me tog ud pa la dag gis/ /sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas/ /
259b1(dkon brtsegs): de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste/ /'di skad du ni smon lam btab/ /nga yi bstan pa tha ma la/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas/ /rgya cher ston par shog ces smras/ /gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /zhe sdang sems ni mi skyed
259b2(dkon brtsegs): par/ /gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /thos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas/ /sems can dag la don gyi tshul/ /rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya/ /ngas kyang 'das
259b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /yang dag chos ni nub pa na/ /'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/ /sems can dag la rgya cher bstan/ /blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas/ /'di la skur ba 'debs par byed/ /ngas ni de skad thos gyur kyang / /zhe sdang
259b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni skyed mi byed/ /ngas ni rtag tu bzod sgoms nas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed/ /bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku/ /gya nom yongs
259b5(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs gyur cing / /gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags/ /bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos/ /nga yi zhabs ni sa reg nas/ /zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang / /sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba/ /thams cad bzod pa'i stobs
259b6(dkon brtsegs): las skyes/ /nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni/ /'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/ /thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /srin po bzhin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /srog chags gzi
259b7(dkon brtsegs): byin 'phrog byed pa/ /nga la rtag tu gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa/ /sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog
259b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs las byung / /rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag /'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag /rab tu gdug cing
260a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs rung ba/ /sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas/ /me tog phreng ba brgya stong thogs/ /'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa/ /thams cad
260a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod mchog stobs las byung / /zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par/ /bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ /
260a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dag ni 'dus gyur nas/ /me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /bye ba brgya phrag drug bcu rnams/ /'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa/ /
260a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gzhan yang klu yi rgyal po ni/ /ma na pa ga la sogs pas/ /mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i/ /brgya stong
260a5(dkon brtsegs): snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/ /rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/ /brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/ /me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod
260a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog stobs las byung / /sa chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgyal/ /lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas/ /thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang / /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /lus med sgra gcan zin la sogs/ /bye ba phrag ni brgya
260a7(dkon brtsegs): stong rnams/ /dang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa/ /sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa/ /thams cad bzod
260a8(dkon brtsegs): mchog stobs las byung / /sa mu ta dang rlung gi lha/ /brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni/ /spos kyi char phab nga mchod pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / lha yi 'khor ni brgya stong dag /lha yi me tog gtor
260b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod de/ /sred spangs sangs rgyas sten byed pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /khyed kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrags nas/ /thams cad kun du thos mdzad pa/ /
260b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos/ /phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang / /bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis/ /thams cad kun ni go mdzad pa/ /thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /
260b3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las mig zad mtha' dag dang / /rab zhi'i sgra ni thos gyur te/ /skye ba'i mtha' yang de bzhin no/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen/ /de las skye yang 'gro 'ong med/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /
260b4(dkon brtsegs): nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas/ /sangs
260b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig mtha' rab zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu
260b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig skye mtha' zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig 'jug rab zhi na/ /sangs rgyas
260b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /mkha' las mig
260b8(dkon brtsegs): dben rab zhi bas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/ /de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/ /
261a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang / /'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang / /khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa/ /rgya cher bshad pa 'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i chos khyad par du
261a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /'khor mang po dang bcas par
261a3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam pa rnam par dag
261a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/
261a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
261a6(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khang bres te lding khang de yang shin du mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun du khyab pa/ gser gyi tsong tsong dra bar bres pa/ /nor
261a7(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che'i phreng ba spyangs pa/ seng ge'i ba dan dang / gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phreng ba'i
261a8(dkon brtsegs): phung po dag gcal du bkram mo/ /me tog tsam pa ka dang a ti mug ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang / 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun du
261b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab par spyangs shing rgyan du bris so/ /gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas/ rin po che'i spos byi li ka dang / du ma tsa dang / tsan dan dang / gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna
261b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs bsregs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar to/ /gzhan yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun du khyab par chag chag btab bo/ /sa bzhi kun
261b3(dkon brtsegs): du me tog sna tshogs bcal du bkram mo/ /de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra gcan zin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub
261b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa'i phyir der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun du khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa dang gdugs tshod la bab par rig
261b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs
261b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thog tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag ni gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/ byad bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhin
261b8(dkon brtsegs): bzang po thob par gyur/ /nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/ gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur/ nye bshes
262a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams ni nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhan yang ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ne tso dang / rma bya dang /
262a2(dkon brtsegs): ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgra de dag thos pa yang
262a3(dkon brtsegs): yid shin du bde bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag
262a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so/ /gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong du ma mu tig dmar po dang / tsan
262a5(dkon brtsegs): dan gyi phye ma thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor to/ /lha ma yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang / dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas
262a6(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan dan gyi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i snod dang / gos la sogs pa'i
262a7(dkon brtsegs): ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang / lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon
262a8(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa/ rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun du khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul to/ /sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus
262b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /de bzhin du sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go /
262b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad
262b3(dkon brtsegs): n am mkha' la khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams
262b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bstan par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob
262b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom
262b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
262b7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer
262b8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs
263a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i
263a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra
263a3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa/ /yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna/ /g.yo sgyu khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang /
263a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni/ /skyes bu gso ba dag dang dbang po drug /yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams
263a5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin/ /chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na/ /sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
263a6(dkon brtsegs): theg la gnas par mos/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pas/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub
263a7(dkon brtsegs): brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas/ /tshul khrims rnam dag stobs kyis byang chub
263a8(dkon brtsegs): brnyes/ /bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan
263b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das
263b2(dkon brtsegs): ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab mos pas/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ni
263b3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/ /bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas/ /shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan
263b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas shes stobs/ /thabs dang gzungs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs/ /las dang rten 'byung yan lag dad dang thos/ /stong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs/ /rab dul yang dag mtha' dang dben mkhas
263b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs/ /'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang / /byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med/ /stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin/ /stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha
263b6(dkon brtsegs): yi gtso/ /yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa/ /grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe/ /sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad/ /sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas/ /
263b7(dkon brtsegs): lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis ni rab tu bkur/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe/ /grong khyer sa chen
263b8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rab tu g.yos/ /bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na/ /ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med/ /bcom ldan grong gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas/ /lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni dga'
264a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na/ /bcom ldan shin du bde zhes bsngags par gyur/ /bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa bzhag tshe/ /rnam dag 'od zer kun gsal
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar gyur/ /rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung / /bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'/ /gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po yi/ /lag dang rkang dang gdub 'khor phreng ba dang / /de bzhin rin
264a3(dkon brtsegs): chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las/ /ma dkrol pa yang rang las sgra snyan byung / /so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing / /skad mang bkra shis mchog gis bsngags pa brjod/ /'on long dbang po ma
264a4(dkon brtsegs): tshang dbang po thob/ /thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang / /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas/ /lha mis me tog mngon par mchod pa byas/ /mkha' las kun du sgra
264a5(dkon brtsegs): snyan byung bas na/ /lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dag /smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod/ /bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa/ /'od zer
264a6(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis bde ba thobs par gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas la/ /dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas/ /thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de/ /thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag
264a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ /kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam rab tshol/ /kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol/ /bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na/ /bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'/ /bcom
264a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas/ /'jig rten rjes mthun phan pa rab tu mdzad/ /chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin/ /rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang / /bcom ldan grong
264b1(dkon brtsegs): khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung / /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung / /
264b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/ /mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na/ /shin du dad pa rgyun mi 'chad/ /
264b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /chos la yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin du dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs
264b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob/ /mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na/ /shin du dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /shin du dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /
264b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong
264b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /gti mug rgyun ni spong bar
264b7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /byang chub ye shes dag la gnas/ /mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/ /byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad/ /mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'/ /'jug pa dang ni rab
264b8(dkon brtsegs): dben dang / /yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang / /mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang / /'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang / /thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan/ /gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /
265a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob
265a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi mtha' srid pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /

265a5(dkon brtsegs): tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig zhi la sred pa/ /de ni rtag tu the tshom med/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /
265a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mig skye dpag
265a7(dkon brtsegs): med gang skyed pa/ /ye shes dpag med skyed par byed/ /ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ /chos 'di bstan pa 'ang de bzhin no/ /mig zad dpag med gang shes pa/ /mig la sgrib pa med par
265a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med 'thob/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bcom
265b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos pas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan the tshom med/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs rgyas
265b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jigs mi byed/ /gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /sangs rgyas yon tan stor ma gyur/ /kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang / /bla med ye shes tshol byed cing / /ma 'dres chos ni
265b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang / /nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed/ /byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /bsam gtan bde la mos pas na/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas/ /dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems/ /
265b4(dkon brtsegs): byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang / /mi zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang / /de la rnam grol ci yang med/ /skye ba len pa thams cad ni/ /de la zhen chags skyed par byed/ /
265b5(dkon brtsegs): gal te skye nyid stong rig na/ /mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs kyang / /mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na/ /bskal pa brgya stong lon yang ni/ /bsam gtan yongs
265b6(dkon brtsegs): su dag mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyer bsngogs thob gyur kyang / /zad mtha' shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur/ /zad pa thos pa ma shes phyir/ /zag pa thob la rtag tu spyod/ /gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa/ /'du shes zad mtha'i shes
265b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ /'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod/ /gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa/ /'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med/ /'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu 'jig rten zag la
265b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas/ /sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med/ /sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod/ /gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas/ /chos zad mtha' yi shes pa med/ /
266a1(dkon brtsegs): chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod/ /sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /yang dag sbyangs la gnas pa min/ /kha dog sgyur
266a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gos bgos kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin/ /ya rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /
266a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin/ /'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /myur du ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te/ /'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes
266a4(dkon brtsegs): med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin/ /bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/ /de ni bzo la mkhas ma yin/ /'dri ba mang la
266a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas gyur cing / /yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /de ni don 'thun bshad ma yin/ /mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang / /gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing / /mig zad mtha'
266a6(dkon brtsegs): yi shes med na/ /chos 'di rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang / /chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/ /'khri shing stug por lhung ba 'dra/ /sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur cing / /
266a7(dkon brtsegs): dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston dang / /tshig 'bru yi ge sgra skad dang / /klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med yin/ /bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang / /tshig mkhan
266a8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par byed pa dang / /lus mnyes ngal sos chos rnams dang / /mkhyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de dag rnams ni shes med yin/ /gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing / /yi ge 'bru gcig
266b1(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /bshad pa de ni don med yin/ /de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang / /mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang
266b2(dkon brtsegs): yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing / /de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de ni nam yang dman pa yin/ /smrang
266b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dag ni 'don byed cing / /gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang / /mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/ /de ni nam yang dman pa yin/ /de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang / /mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du
266b4(dkon brtsegs): yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// // bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan grong khyer
266b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /mkha' las
266b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan sgra thos pas/ /mig mi rang bzhin rtogs par gyur/ /stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas/ /thams cad rnam dag mig thob 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang / /nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas/ /bag med pa yi bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /
266b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/ /steng gi nam mkha' dag las ni/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos/ /kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi/ /dpe zla med pa ming yang thos/ /kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing / /'jig rten
267a1(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing / /nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig 'jig rten dag la ni/ /rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos/ /kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas/ /
267a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas/ /sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ /kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang / /'khon 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis/ /
267a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba/ /rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/ /kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis/ /'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/ /ming ni de dag thos gyur na/ /thams cad
267a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag mig thob gyur/ /nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu/ /ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang / /thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thub mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mi bzad nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku
267a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na/ /kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /
267a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig skye nges pa thob gyur na/ /chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na/ /
267a7(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/ /des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi
267a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos dag nas/ /sgra rnams dang ni ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya/ /de tshe sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos/ /rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang lha ni mang
267b1(dkon brtsegs): po rnams/ /thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur/ /bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos/ /lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang zhugs nas/ /phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras/ /
267b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na/ /lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad/ /sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung shin du legs/ /'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad/ /
267b3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas
267b4(dkon brtsegs): shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum lhas ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags
267b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /
267b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ /bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi/ /lha mi'i gtso mchog la ni brten nas su/ /sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer/ /dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad
267b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bye bar ni/ /spyod mchog khyad 'phags
267b8(dkon brtsegs): med mngon bsgrubs nas ni/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan/ /'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams de skad thos nas ni/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags
268a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lhas ni de thos nas/ /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /
268a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad/ /bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas/ /skye dgu drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer/ /tshangs ris
268a3(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang / /thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/ /khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ /de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas/ /
268a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du/ /'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad/ /bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha yi bar du yang / /sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos/ /
268a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sgra ni kun du grags pas na/ /lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel/ /bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing / /lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyis log pa rab btul nas/ /
268a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du brnyes/ /de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur nas/ /'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin du legs/ /rnam dag mig ni sems can sbyin zhes
268a7(dkon brtsegs): zer/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams/ /mi gtsang bsgom pa bshad thos pas/ /'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /zhe sdang dag gis gdungs
268a8(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams/ /byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas/ /zhe sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /gti mug dag gi gdungs pa rnams/ /shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas/ /gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /
268b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /phrag
268b2(dkon brtsegs): dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /bcom ldan grong
268b3(dkon brtsegs): khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ /ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas/ /ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs/ /gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa/ /dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas/ /mang du thos pa'i
268b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshor zhugs nas/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed/ /gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod/ /yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing / /snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston/ /gzhan yang
268b5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las sgra thos pas/ /bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang / /gdud rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar/ /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad/ /mig dang rna ba
268b6(dkon brtsegs): sna lce lus/ /gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang / /bskum pa dang ni bkyang ba bdag /ston par mdzad pa khyad par 'phags/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pas na/ /'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing / /gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang / /
268b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin/ /snod dang snod min de rjes su/ /mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas/ /sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa ma byas shing / /dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la/ /sems can
268b8(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar bshad pas mdzad/ /gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing / /lta la brten nas spros dga' ba/ bcom ldan de dag lta ba dang / spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad/ /gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa nyid du stong ba dang / /'gro 'ong med
269a1(dkon brtsegs): cing mtshan med dang / /ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos/ /gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag /mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan/ /de bzhin chos kyi spyan par du/ /yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs
269a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra/ /rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra/ /ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur/ /sems can dag ni ji snyed la/ /ji bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas/ /ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra skad kyis/ /yang dag chos
269a3(dkon brtsegs): ni bstan par mdzad/ /sems can la la gang zhig ni/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos/ /rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /sems can dbang
269a4(dkon brtsegs): po ji lta bzhin/ /rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas/ /len 'dzin ston la dgod par mdzad/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang / /sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gi/ /mtshan
269a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ston pa thos par gyur/ /gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi/ /'od zer tshad med ston pa dang / /nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang / /spangs min ston pa thos par gyur/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid/ /las dang
269a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu mi mtshungs mi/ /skye len tha dad thos par gyur/ /res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu/ /bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nas/ /mkha' las skyo ston sgra bsgrags pas/ /gang thos 'dod chags sel bar mdzad/ /shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin/ /shin tu dang
269a7(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes gyur pa/ /thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du/ /bla med chos ni ston par mdzad/ /maud gal bu dang 'od srung dang / /ka pi na dang kun dga' dang / /'od srung chen po dag dang ni/ /kun shes kaudin+ya la sogs/ /de dag mos pa ji bzhin du/ /nyan thos chos ston thos
269a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ /lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin/ /gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang / /be ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang / /grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par gyur/ /i di si/ bi di si/ ir su
269b1(dkon brtsegs): i ra/ au na si/ /ma ni si/ u khyi/ a no khyi/ A khi tsa la mang naM ye/ nga ra ni sh+tha ni mi/ ta ka ni/ e mi man tra/ ni ha ra/ a bu re/ b+hUd d+he/ ni re/ a khi tsha ra/ bi ya ki ri ya te/ a khi tshar bar mI te/ ka lA ba hi ni/ sarbo bid shi nir d+he paun/ pa ra shas da te/ sha sA ta/ b+ha ra sha sad ta/
269b2(dkon brtsegs): ta ra sad ta/ b+hU mi/ A ma b+ha ra/ li la b+han/ shi tsi tsid ta/ bi ba ma ti/ tsid ta a nan ta/ o be ra ha ba mI ta b+hU mi/ na nam kA ni/ a ka ni bi b+hi mid ta/ sha ri be sh+tha/ a ma la ni ma lA/ bU li te na ra shi tsa/ ha ha ri/ ma ma lI/ b+ha ra ni tish+tha/ tsak+Shu ni ha ra/ U d+ha ri ta pa tsi/ An
269b3(dkon brtsegs): ta ri/ ke tu su ke tu su pa ri ni/ ka ri ni/ su su ma ni yai/ ka ka ri/ ka khA ri/ u pa la mU ri/ tish+tha da ri na/ na ga nir ha re/ par b+had te/ A te pa ra ya te/ An ta ra b+han d+he/ An ta ra ta b+ha ti shi tsa/ ha sI ri ma kha lI/ I ni sam b+ha re/ tish+tha sit+ta ra ni/

272b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon gtor nas/ /bla med ye shes tshol la ltos/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni/ /bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na/ /deng ni bcom ldan phrad gyur nas/ /so sor dga' bar
272b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin/ /spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod/ /de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu/ /sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba/ /thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas/ /
273a1(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni shes par gyur/ /mig gi skye mtha' shes pa nas/ /rab zhi mtshan nyid bar du rtogs/ /gzhan yang mig zad la sogs pa'i/ /mig don dag ni dpag med rtogs/ /des na tshig mkhas dag
273a2(dkon brtsegs): gis ni/ /sems can rnams la yang dag bstan/ /ming dang don rnams la yang ni/ /zhen dang the tshom med pas na/ /'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing / /blang dor med pa nyid du gyur/ /rang bzhin dag ni stong dben pas/ /

273a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pas na/ /yang dag brjod du ci yang med/ /rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched 'das/ /brdzun pa med cing bden pa'ang med/ /gnas dang gnas pa yod pa min/ /tshigs gis smra
273a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam chad ci/ /sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi/ /skye bo'i mtshan ma zhen pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong / /bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang / /byis pa yang dag ma
273a6(dkon brtsegs): yin rtog / bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ /de yi mtshan mar rtog pa ste/ /mya ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur/ /gang gis mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa/ /
273a7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur/ /gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la/ /rnam rtog med pa shes rab 'thob/ /gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong / /des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong / /
273a8(dkon brtsegs): skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dag la/ /rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong / /dga' ba dag ni skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas/ /bdud kyi spyod yul snang
273b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ /gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong / /de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin/ /de ni mya ngan gdungs bcas pas/ /mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin/ /chos la thob par gang lta ba/ /de la chos stor mya ngan yod/ /sangs
273b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod/ /bskal pa mang po gang bsgoms pas/ /mtshan ma thams cad rtogs pas na/ /grong khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du
273b3(dkon brtsegs): shes med/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na/ /grong khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing / /mya ngan 'das pa'i 'du shes med/ /gang gis de ltar rab shes pa/ /sangs rgyas
273b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing / /ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs pas/ /mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med/ /bcom ldan bskal pa dpag med nas/ /dka' ba rnams ni rab spyad nas/ /ngo bo nyid ni stong mkhyen na/ /byis pa rnams kyi
273b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi rtogs so/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/ /'khor ni brgya stong mang gis bskor/ /mi dang mi ma yin la sogs/ /dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa bas/ /gang gis skad cig tsam du ni/ /mig zad
273b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni rab sems shing / /mtshan ma rnams ni stong rtogs na/ /'di yi bsod nams de bas 'phags/ /bgrang ba dang ni grangs kyi cha/ /rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do/ /de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mig gi mtha'
273b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jug pa nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang / /de bzhin du ni rig par bya/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/ /sgra dang ming gi bar du yang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /de nas de tshe
273b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis/ /sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos/ /ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang / /thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs/ /
274a1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi ni chos kyi phyir/ /thams cad 'ongs nas gus mchod byas/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /lha yi dbang po mi yi rgyal/ /lha ma yin ni mang po dang / /
274a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dag ni mang po rnams/ /rang gi grong khyer spangs nas ni/ /bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus gyur te/ /rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /
274a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i/ /bya yi tshogs ni tshad med pa/ /ne tso dang ni rma bya dang / /ka la ping ka bya yi rnams/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /yon tan mchog ni mthong bas na/ /thams cad
274a4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dag la ni/ /rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse/ /thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /sgra snyan dag ni rab tu phyung / /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /bcom
274a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang / /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/ /sems can tshad med brgya stong snyed/ /ldongs ba dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/ /dbang po ma tshang gang yin pa/ /
274a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag /thams cad bde ba thob par gyur/ /de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /'di skad
274a7(dkon brtsegs): smra ba thos par gyur/ /gang gis mtshan ma rnams kyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs byed pa/ /de yis bcom ldan 'das la ni/ /mchod pa byas shes brjod mi bya/ /mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/ /rtogs
274a8(dkon brtsegs): par yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma rnams ni gang spangs pa/ /yon tan bzhi ni bsags pas na/ /mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/ /rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i mtha'/ /
274b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang / /rab tu rtogs par khong du chud/ /mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la/ /mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang / /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ /
274b2(dkon brtsegs): rten cing gnas pa med pa dang / /mig ni rab tu dben pa la/ /g.yo ba'i bsam pa med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ /rnam par
274b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med pa dang / /mig gi mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /de la yid kyi rtog med dang / /mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la/ /bstan par bya ba med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du
274b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin/ /mig ni med par gyur pa la/ /mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / /mig ni skye ba med pa la/ /yongs su sdud pa med pa dang / /mig ni rab tu zhi ba la/ /'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin
274b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig ni zad par shes pa'i phyir/ /mtshan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / /mig gi mtha' ni shes pa'i phyir/ /dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang / /mig
274b6(dkon brtsegs): ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir/ /dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas/ /gzugs ni khong du chud pa dang / /mig
274b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig par rab shes nas/ /chos la so sor rtog pa dang / /mig ni skye med shes gyur nas/ /lam ni sgrub par gang byed pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /
274b8(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i
275a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs
275a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig gis 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin
275a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa yi/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong
275a4(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig gi med pa gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs pa 'gyur/ /mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par
275a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /mig gi skye med gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs
275a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig gi mi rtog nyid/ /yang dag ji bzhin
275a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba
275a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig la yi ge med/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag kyang / /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa yin/ /sangs rgyas ye shes stobs
275b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig gi mi 'ong nyid/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'dod rnams
275b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /
275b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bsam gtan bsgom pa dag /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/ /nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa/ /de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa/ /rab tu rtogs par
275b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/ /gang zag des ni de bzhin du/ /mig gis sngon mtha' shes pa dang / /mig gi mi gnas shes pa dang / /mig
275b5(dkon brtsegs): gi skye ba shes pa dang / /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang / /mig gi dman pa shes pa dang / /mig gi khyad par 'phags shes dang / /ye shes dman pa shes pa dang / /rnam dag ye shes shes pa
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /tshul khrims rnam dag shes pa dang / /lus kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang / /ngag gi sdom pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sems kyi
275b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / /gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang / /sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang / /sems skyon shes pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag las ni shes pa dang / /sems kyi sdom pa'i
275b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / /nyes dmigs shes pa'i shes pa dang / /rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang / /phung po'i bye brag shes pa dang / /phung po'i rgyu rkyen shes pa dang / /mig ni yongs shes shes pa dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung gnas shes pa dang / /
276a1(dkon brtsegs): zag med tshul khrims shes pa dang / /tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang / /sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa dang / /sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyu shes dang / /'dus byas rnams kyi shes pa dang / /zag pa zad pa'i shes pa
276a2(dkon brtsegs): dag / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/ /gzhan yang rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi/ /spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang / /spyod pa med pa'i shes pa dang / /mtshan ma bcas dang mtshan ma med/ /'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma
276a3(dkon brtsegs): byas/ /rnam par gzhag dang yongs sdud dang / /bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang mig zad skye mtha' dang / /mig gi mtha' dang rab dben dang / /'jug pa dang ni
276a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / /mi skye ba dang nyer zhi nyid/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/ /sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang / /mthu dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang / /brtson 'grus ye shes 'thob
276a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /gzhan yang gcig dang tha dad shes/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi/ /mos pa
276a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags pa dang / /rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang / /las dang rnam smin shes pa dang / /dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang / /sems kyi 'gyur ba shes pa dang / /shes rab mos pa'i shes pa dang / /
276a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam grol shes pa dang / /spobs pa mchog gi shes pa dag /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang sems can ma rungs dang / /chos la mos pa med gyur pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/ /
276a8(dkon brtsegs): mos pa'i shes pa skyed par byed/ /gzhan yang don gyi tshul dag ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/ /le lo med pa'i shes pa dag /dus shes sgrub par byed pa yin/ /gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/ /
276b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dag /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang / /tshig gis bstan pa gang yin pa/ /rjes su shes pa'i shes pa dag /
276b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang grogs bzang 'thun gnas dang / /gos dang zas dang btung ba dag /tshod shes pa yi shes pa rnams/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang
276b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med pa yi/ /gzugs kyi chos ni gang yin pa/ /nan tan bsgrub pa'i shes pa dag /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing / /sgro 'dogs skur 'debs
276b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs spangs nas/ /bla med ye shes gang tshol ba/ /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /sprul pa'i sku ni rab
276b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ /yongs su smin par mdzad pas na/ /thams cad rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /dad pa skyes pa'i shes pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang / /mos shing
276b6(dkon brtsegs): gus pa'i shes pa dang / /'dod chags spangs pa'i chos dag la/ /rab mos bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang / /'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la yang / /mchod par mos pa'i shes pa dang / /byang chub chen po dag
276b7(dkon brtsegs): la yang / /rab mos bsngo ba'i shes pa dang / /gzungs rnams kyi ni sgo dag la/ /rab mos ston pa'i shes pa dang / /mos pa rnams ni gang yin pa/ /so sor rab rtogs shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i ting
276b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gang yin pa/ /legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / /bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la/ /nges par byed pa'i shes pa dang / /dpag tu med pa'i sems dag la/ /legs par 'jug pa'i
277a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / /tshigs su bcad pa tshad med rnams/ /yang dag ston pa'i shes pa dang / /'dod pa'i mtshams sbyor gang yin pa/ /rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang / /'gro ba dman pa de dag tu/ /
277a2(dkon brtsegs): ltung bar mi 'gyur shes pa dang / /mi dge bshes gnyen gang yin pa/ /yongs su spong byed shes pa dang / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang yin pa/ /sten par byed pa'i shes pa dang / /'dri zhing lan ldon gang
277a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ /rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang / /gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa/ /legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / /sa dang sa min gang yin pa/ /legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / /rab
277a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bring tha ma gang yin pa/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang / /'dus byas shes pa gang yin dang / /'dus ma byas kyi shes pa dang / /dngos po dang ni rdzas kyi shes/ /dngos dang rdzas min shes pa dang / /
277a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sdud byed shes pa dang / /yongs su sdud min shes pa dang / /mngon par sgrub pa'i shes pa dang / /yang dag sgrub min shes pa dang / /mig dang mig min shes pa dang / /mig dang lhan
277a6(dkon brtsegs): cig shes pa dang / /mig gi bye brag shes pa dang / /mig gi rang bzhin shes pa dang / /yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni
277a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig mig gi rgyu rkyen nyid/ /yang dag stong zhing dben pa dang / /mthar ni bdag yod ma yin par/ /sems par byed pa gang yin pa/ /
277a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zag des ni bzhin du/ /yang dag nges pa kho nar ni/ /sems kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig gi rten 'brel dang / /mig mi rtag
277b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid dag / des pa nyid du rtogs gyur nas/ /sems par byed pa gang yin pa/ /gang zag des ni de bzhin du/ /mig gi rgyu rkyen gang yin dang / /mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par
277b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /zhabs
277b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sa la reg tsam gyis/ /dngos po ngo mtshar rab bstan pa/ /deng 'dir bdag gi mdor bsdus nas/ /yon tan phyogs ni cung zad cig /sems can dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /yang dag par ni stan par bya/ /
277b4(dkon brtsegs): de tshe lha mi 'dren pa yis/ /spu yi khung bu gcig nas ni/ /'od zer brgya stong tshad med snyed/ /rab tu bkye bar gyur pas na/ /'od zer dag ni re res kyang / /zhing ni tshad med gsal mdzad nas/ /sems can
277b5(dkon brtsegs): mang po kun gyi phyir/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu mdzad/ /gang zhig 'das pa'i dus su ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang / /yun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dag /mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa/ /
277b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yi gang zag dag /des ni ji skad bstan pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul dngos po thos gyur na/ /rab tu dga' zhing mos par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnams/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi/ /
277b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul min par rab shes nas/ /de lta bu yi gang zag ni/ /des ni ji skad bstan pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul dag ni thos gyur na/ /mos pa dag ni skye 'gyur zhing / /ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i sems kyang skyed/ /
277b8(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis/ /de lta bu la sogs pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab bstan pas/ /sems can dag ni brgya stong dang / /tshad med grangs med pa
278a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni/ /bsten cing rim gro mchod pa byas/ /lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis/ /mdo sde dag ni brgya
278a2(dkon brtsegs): stong dang / /tshad med grangs med rab bshad pas/ /sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /bstan pa de ni thos pas na/ /thams cad dang bas rab blangs te/ /sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /de yi
278a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /grongs khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mthu dag gis/ /nam mkha' las ni 'di skad du/ /mig zad mtha' ni shes pa nas/ /mig ni nye bar zhi ba dang / /
278a4(dkon brtsegs): mig nyid rgyu yi bar du yang / /'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang / /mthar ni stong dben shes par gyis/ /de skad du ni thos par gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni
278a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas/ /de bzhin
278a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mtshan sna tshogs/ /bsngags pa brjod par gyur pas na/ /'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams/ /thams cad dad mos sems kyang skyes/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi
278a7(dkon brtsegs): seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpung dag /pham mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /log par lta ba'i tshogs thams cad/ /
278a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dul bar nus shes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni 'dod chags gzhom pa dang / zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi
278b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan/ /thos par gyur ba de dag ni/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni zhe sdang
278b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /zhe sdang dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs
278b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni gti mug gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /gti mug dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams
278b4(dkon brtsegs): cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /
278b5(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /nga rgyal dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni khong khro gzhom pa dang / /
278b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /khong khro dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /
278b7(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni phrag dog gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /phrag dog dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams
278b8(dkon brtsegs): cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni mi bden gzhom pa dang / /zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /

279a7(dkon brtsegs): seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /thos par gyur pa de dag ni/ /rdzu 'phrul yon tan gang yin pa/ /yongs
279a8(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu

280a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ /mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa yi/ /kun 'dzin chos kyi rje zhes bya/ /gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ /'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ /mig zad mtha' don gang
280a8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ /yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/ /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / /me tog phreng ba spos dag dang / /mar me gdug dang gos
280b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang / /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ // // bam po lnga pa ste tha ma// de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag ni/ /rdzu 'phrul
280b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi ni stobs rnams kyis/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /sgra snyan dam pa rab byung ste/ /gzugs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs dag /yang dag par ni bstan pas na/ /'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams/ /'di lta bu
280b3(dkon brtsegs): yi tshig thos te/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /mig gi zad mtha' gang yin dang / /skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams dang / /rab dben dang ni 'jug pa nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi/ /

280b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs/ /zag dang bcas dang zag med dang / /don rnams dang ni phan pa dag /thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang / /mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs/ /srid pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rten cing gnas par mi
280b8(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / /gzugs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni/ /rab tu dben par gnas par byed/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang / /dge ba ma yin mi dge min/ /lung du mi ston pa yang min/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i//
281a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yi mtshan ma rnams/ /thams cad yongs su dag pas na/ /dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang / /gnas par yang ni mi byed do/ /nyan thos dang ni skye bo dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos la
281a2(dkon brtsegs): yang / /gnas par yang ni mi byed do/ /mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag dang / /skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dag ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad yongs su zhi bar
281a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /skye ba dang ni mi skye dang / /sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba dang / /bstod pa dag ni smad pa dag /thams cad yongs su spong zhes zer/ /mthar phyin snang ba gang yin dang / /stong pa'i gzungs ni gang yin
281a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /rab tu gnas par byed pa yin/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas rol pa yi/ /gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /'di nyid sangs
281a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rdzu 'phrul la/ /rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin/ /'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen pa la/ /rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin/ /mig zad mtha' yi stobs dag la/ /de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang / /mig
281a6(dkon brtsegs): skye mtha' yi stobs dag la/ /de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang / /mig gi mtha' yi stobs dag la/ /de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i stobs kyi bar/ /de la rab tu gnas pa dang / /rna ba sna lce
281a7(dkon brtsegs): lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni rnams pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs/ /
281a8(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed ces zer/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /gzi byin mthu stobs de lta bu/ /yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs
281b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi/ gnas kun la ni 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /spyod yul kun la gnas 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun/ /lha ma yin gyi tshogs dag la/ /brtan par 'dzin pa'i sems spangs nas/ /tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed/ /
281b2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med dang / /grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/ /de dag thams cad kun kyang ni/ /rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed/ /dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang / /srin po'i 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /

281b4(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /dpag par bya ba ma yin dang / /sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /gzungs bar bya ba min zhes zer/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/ /mig gis dmigs par bya ba min/ /

281b6(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /gzhan yang mig gis zad mtha' dang / /mig rnams kyi ni skye mtha' dang / /mig
281b7(dkon brtsegs): gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag la/ /bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang / /sems dang srog ni med pa dang / /de bzhin gang zag med pa dang / /mtshan ma med cing byed med dang / /'gro ba med
281b8(dkon brtsegs): cing 'ong med dang / /'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan/ /thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyid kyi/ /mig ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ /gzhan yang 'di skad chos
282a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams las/ /grub pa'i mig ni gang yin dang / /ye shes mig dang shes rab mig /tshangs pa'i mig dang lha mig dang / /tshangs pa'i skyes nas thob mig dang / /lhar ni skyes nas thog mig dang / /tshangs pa'i
282a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin mig dag dang / /lha yi rnam smin mig dag dang / /tshangs pa'i rgyu las skyes mig dang / /lha yi rgyu las skyes pa'i mig /lha yi rdzu 'phrul mi dag dang / /lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig /dman par skyes pa'i mig

282a4(dkon brtsegs): mig dag dang / /yongs su gdung min mig dag dang / /rnam par dag pa'i mig dag dang / /rnam par dag min mig dag dang / /chur ring zhing thung mig dag dang / /nyan thos theg pa'i mig dag dang / /bsam gtan pa yi mig dag
