282a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /rgyu min las byung mig dag dang / /mtshungs par ldan pa'i mig dag dang / /mtshungs par ldan min mig dag dang / /bsgo brten las byung mig dag dang / /bsgo las byung min mig dag dang / /rgyu rkyen las byung mig dag
282a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /sha las grub min mig dag dang / /ye shes rnam par dag mig dang / /yod pa min pa'i mig dag dang / /dmigs med mig ni gang yin pa/ /thams cad rtogs par byed ces zer/ /rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ /sgra dang
282a8(dkon brtsegs): ming la sogs pa'i bar/ /chos ni rnam par nyi shu lnga/ thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/ /gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i sgra/ /sgra snyan dam pa
282b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog byung nas/ /khyad par 'phags pa gzungs kyi chos/ /'di skad du ni bka' stsal te/ /'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /rdzu 'phrul dag gis sprul pa yin/ /'di lta ste/ si le/ ma le ma le/ sid
282b2(dkon brtsegs): d+he ai ni/ si Ne ku lu ni yu/ ku lu ne yu/ ku le ma le/ ku no te/ a la shi a si le/ si si le te/ su si le/ si le si le/ khyi pi le/ A pI le su Te tsa na/ d+ha ni ma ni/ ka ni/ ka le te/ su
282b3(dkon brtsegs): ka le/ pra ya/ /sha nang ni/ a nu lo si kyi/ bi lo mi/ su b+ha ni re sh+he/ a shi ri le/ sar ma pa ra phan te/ pa ri b+ha he/ d+ha ra ni/ d+he shu tsi ha/ su d+he/ a tsa na/ b+hu po ga gnang / kur ba no/ b+ha sa b+ha nang /
282b4(dkon brtsegs): pan ri d+hu ri ya/ ni pa ri ka no ni/ ma na b+ha/ su ru tsi Ta/ ba na A tsa ra/ A b+hA+e la bir+ya pra Ti sh+tha ha/ d+ha ri ni/ a si Ta/ lo Ni b+hi/ //gzungs rnams gang yin 'di dag ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brnyes/ /mthu
282b5(dkon brtsegs): chen dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /shes rab dag ni tshad kyang med/ /'dzin pa dag ni yongs su spong / /dran pa dag ni dag par byed/ /gzungs med 'gro dang 'ong ba med/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams yod pa min/ mtshan
282b6(dkon brtsegs): ma med cing brjod dang bral/ /spros pa dag las yang dag 'das/ /byang chub sems dpas sgrub byed na/ /mthar ni gsil ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag /brgya stod mang po dag gi ni/ /
282b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs cig tsam ni rab bstan kyang / /mtha' ni dmigs par yod mi nus/ /'phags pa mang pos rab tu bsngags/ /rnam par dag cing zhen pa med/ /'khor 'dus mang po thams cad kyis/ /shin tu
282b8(dkon brtsegs): gus pa skyed par byed/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gi/ /dge ba'i chos kyi mthu stobs kyis/ /nyon mongs rab bcom nyer zhi nas/ /khyad 'phags phan yon thos par byed/ /yon tan dang ni shes rab dag /
283a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgya che rgya mtsho 'dra/ /bzod pa dag ni sgrub par byed/ /sems ni rab bde g.yo med 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas rtag tu bsgoms/ /mkhas pa dag gis rab tu bsngags/ /dbul phongs
283a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni spong byed cing / /nor dang rin chen 'thob par byed/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /yon tan rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /rtag tu stong nyid la sogs pa'i/ /bden tshig dag gis rab tu
283a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan/ /yi ge dag ni spangs pas na/ /stong pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya/ /sems dang rnam shes spangs pas na/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya/ /gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ /dri bral rtag tu rnam dag byed/ /yang dag ye
283a4(dkon brtsegs): shes la gnas nas/ /phan pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ /sems can dag ni mang po rnams/ /dga' zhing dang ba skyed par byed/ /gnod sbyin 'khor ni tshad med dang / /grul bum 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /'di la sogs
283a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yi dags rgyal/ /dga' ba chen po skyed ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /rab tu zhi zhing spros pa med/ /sems can dag la byams pas na/ /kun la bde ba sbyin par byed/ /bskal ba mang
283a6(dkon brtsegs): po brgya stong du/ /'gro ba rnams su rtags gnas shing / /phan pa tshad med pa byed kyang / /rnam par dag cing gos pa med/ tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/ /bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab bstan nas/ /sems
283a7(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni tshad med rnams/ /dga' ba chen po skyed par byed/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas tshad med rnams/ /shin tu rnam dag mos pa yis/ /gzungs 'di la ni brten nas su/ /rtag tu chos nyid dgongs
283a8(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /tshangs dang brgya byin lha rnams dang / /klu yi rgyal po lha ma yin/ /gzungs 'di thos par gyur nas kyang / /sems kyis dga' ba skyed ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams/ /
283b1(dkon brtsegs): gang du gnas pa'i yul der ni/ /rtag tu gnod dang 'khrugs pa dang / /nad dang sdug bsngal mya ngan med/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kun/ /so sor dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ /gzungs 'di
283b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bdag cag gi/ sems la gnas par smon lam 'debs/ gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ lus dang sems dang rkan dag dang / /kha mchu dag la gnas gyur na/ /yon tan dpag med skyed par
283b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /gal te rtag tu 'dzin byed na/ /yon tan tshad med thob gyur nas/ /sems can mang la phan 'dogs shing / /thams cad dga' ba thob ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag gis/ /sdig pa
283b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rab spong zhing / /dam chos dag ni ston byed pas/ /thug pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob/ /sems can dag ni rgya stong rnams/ /the tshom dag ni rab bsal nas/ /nga rgyal rnams ni rab bcom ste/ /
283b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dpag med 'thob ces zer/ /shin tu zab cing gsang ba'i chos/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ mkhas pas rtag tu sems byed cing / /nan tan gyis ni sgrub par byed/ /shes rab go
283b6(dkon brtsegs): cha rab bgos nas/ /nyon mongs rab tu 'joms par byed/ /yon tan sems ni 'phel byed pas/ /rab tu mos shing skyo ba med/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /grags pa chen po phun tshogs
283b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /zad pa dang ni mi zad dang / /skye dang mi skye mtha' rab rtogs/ /'di 'dra'i shes rab sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag nyid rab tu brgyan pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong rnams/ /shin tu gus shing
283b8(dkon brtsegs): mched pa mdzad/ /de 'dra'i gzungs ni gang yin pa/ /rig pa dag gis rkang gnyis byed/ /ting 'dzin mchog la rab gnas nas/ /byang chub lam la gzhol bar byed/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing / /
284a1(dkon brtsegs): zag med shes rab rtogs par byed/ /rab dang dbang po stobs kyis ni/ /lag gnyis yongs su grub par byed/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa yis/ /nu ma gnyis ni grub par byed/ /shes
284a2(dkon brtsegs): rab pha rol phyin pas ni/ /spyi gtsug mtshan nyid rab tu byed/ /mdo sde dag gis skur byas nas/ /so sor rig bzhi phreng bar rgyus/ /sngon ni mngon par bsgrubs pa yi/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /dpe
284a3(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med ji snyed pa/ /thams cad rab tu brgyan ces zer/ /gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni/ /yon tan tshad med phun tshogs pas/ /mig gi sngon dang phyi mtha' dang / /zad dang mi zad mtha'
284a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /skye ba dang ni mi skye dang / /mtha' dang mtha' min gang yin dang / dben pa dang ni mi dben dang / /'jug pa dang ni 'jug min dang / /ci yang med dang mi 'byung dang / /nyer zhi dang ni bdag med dang / /gang
284a5(dkon brtsegs): zag med dang srog med dang / /sems can med pa'i bar dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i tshad med sgo/ /thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen
284a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming bar du/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/ /gong du bsngags pa brjod pa yi/ /gzungs mchog dam pa gang yin pa/ /rab dben yon tan mchog ldan zhing / /
284a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul yin pas na/ /gzungs don yang dag gang yin pa/ /yi ges brjod bya ma yin yang / /'jig rten pa yi rjes su ni/ /btags pa'i ming gis brjod pa yin/ /de nas bcom
284a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du byon pa dang / gdan shams pa la rab tu bzhugs so/ /de yi tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs par rig
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdag nyid mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pa thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams la rab tu phul te mchod pa de yang bsam gtan dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam gtan gyi yon tan
284b2(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu las mngon par grub pa sha stag go/ de ltar mchod pa phul ba yang bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin gyi sems can tshad med pa thams cad bla
284b3(dkon brtsegs): na med pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhing phan yon chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod cing phul bas na mchod pa des kun du khyab cing thams cad rab tu tshim par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod gsol
284b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'og tu 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i mdun du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas sbyin pa'i tshogs
284b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sgrub par byed na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par byed cing tshig snyan pas yongs su sdud par byed pa dang / mtshan gya
284b6(dkon brtsegs): nom pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan 'das pa mngon du byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams zad nas dbang phyug mchog 'thob pa dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / 'khor
284b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa mchog mngon par grub pa dang / spyod pa bla na med cing mtshungs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bag chags yang dag par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
284b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / lus dang ring bsrel 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa rnams rab tu btul bas mi'i rgyal po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang / tshangs
285a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po rnams yongs su dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mthu chen po dang ldan pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa
285a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar du len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang dag
285a3(dkon brtsegs): par ston par 'gyur ba dang / sems la le lo med pa dang / chos la ser sna med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten na mchog tu gyur cing ming dang gzugs yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
285a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sku mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa
285a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdig pa can gyi spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgyu la mngon par yid ches pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud par byed pa dang / bdud mang po pham par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis
285a6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos bden pa dag la the tshom dang / nem nur med pa dang / 'dod pa ngan pa rnams rab tu bcom pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rdzu 'phrul
285a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / skye shi spong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / spyod pa dpag tu med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / yon tan rnams yongs su sdud
285a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams la spro ba bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba la yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa gtong ba mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen po'i sgor 'jug par
285b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / bro bar gyur ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs nges pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi bzod pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam la bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhon
285b2(dkon brtsegs): nu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad bcu po 'di dag phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
285b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' blo chen gang / /sbyin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa la/ /phan yon mchog ni brgyad bcu yod/ /ngas mdor bsdus
285b4(dkon brtsegs): te bstan pa yin/ /gzhan yang dpag med bsam bka' yi/ /yon tan dag ni gang yin pa/ thams cad sbyin pa las skyes ste/ /deng 'dir cung zad bstan par bya/ /khyod kyis 'khor 'dus mang po la/ /mnyam
285b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis gang mchod pa/ /sbyin pa'i tshogs ni de dag la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya/ /sbyin pa 'di yis bsags pa yi/ /bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab/ /mtshan dang dpe byad
285b6(dkon brtsegs): lus brgyan pa/ /thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skye gnas dang ni rus rigs dang / /yul rnams dang ni khyim dag dang / grags pa dang ni gzugs dang sems/ /thams cad yongs su dag
285b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /lha rnams rdzu 'phrul dngos po dang / /gzhal med khang dang lha mo dang / /rnam dag thog med spobs pa yang / /sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin/ /sbyin pa'i tshogs mchog gang yin pa/ /sangs
285b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis 'di skad du/ /'di ni dang por byang chub rnams/ /gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags par mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can/ /sbyin la the tshom med pa dag /nges pa'i
286a1(dkon brtsegs): sems la rab gnas nas/ /sbyin pa nan tan bsgrub par gyis/ /sbyin pa'i sems ni gang dag gis/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpas sgrub byed na/ /sangs
286a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i mthu yi stobs kyis ni/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog ni rdzogs byed pas/ /zhing ni bye ba bsgul byas kyang / /sems can rnams la gnod mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa gtang ba'i dbang
286a3(dkon brtsegs): gis na/ /rnam dag tshul khrims mang thos dang / /yang dag yid ches brtson 'grus dang / /ting 'dzin zag med shes rab 'dren/ /sbyin pa gtang ba'i dbang gis na/ /dbang po stobs dang yang dag lam/ /yang dag
286a4(dkon brtsegs): spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang / /bag chags spong ba 'dren par byed/ /sbyin pa gtang ba'i dbang gis na/ /rnam dag sgra snyan dag gis ni/ /zhing ni bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /dpag med chos ston 'dren par byed/ / yongs su
286a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bas sbyin gtang bas/ /rdzu 'phrul rnams ni myur du 'thob/ /rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /nan tan sbyin pa gtang bar gyis/ /lha ni mang po tshad med rnams/ /lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang / /gnod
286a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin brgya stong mang po dang / /'khor rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/ /gzhal med khang mchog rab zhugs te/ rang dbang dag gis rtse byed pa/ /'di la sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams/ /sbyin la brtson pa
286a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong gyur na/ thams cad langs nas bsu nas ni/ /stan bting mchod pa dag kyang byed/ /sbyin gtong gang zag gang yin pa/ /gzi byin chen po phun tshogs shing / /rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbang thob pas/ /
286a8(dkon brtsegs): lha rgyal rnams ni sdud par byed/ /grul bum dang ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dri za 'khor bcas rnams kyis kyang / /rol mo dag gis mchod par byed/ /chom rkun dag ni byams
286b1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed/ /ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro/ /nor rnams nyams par mi gyur te/ /bang mdzod dag ni gang bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir/ /tshogs mchog dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
286b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes thug par mu stegs chos ni spyod mi byed/ /de la na ba yod med de/ /gzungs rnams yongs su srung bar byed/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnams kyang / /sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin/ /de ltar sbyin pa
286b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gtong ba/ /byang chub lam ni sgrub par byed/ /mi dge bshes gnyen phrad mi 'gyur/ spyod mthun grogs po 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sogs byed pa/ /
286b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs dag dang / /shes rab yongs su rdzogs byed pas/ /tshigs su bcad pa tshad med kyis/ /kun 'dzin yang dag ston par byed/ thams cad la ni thogs med pas/ /ngo bo nyid don stor mi 'gyur/ /
286b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni rgya che la/ /mos pa'i sems ni brtan par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims dag pa phun tshogs shing / /bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed/ /'dod pa lnga la zhen med cing / /rtse gcig yang dag dran pa tshol/ /
286b6(dkon brtsegs): sems la rtag tu rmongs med pas/ /'dod pa dag la sred mi skyed/ /zhe sdang nyon mongs gang yin pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab tu rtogs/ /spyod yul dag ni thams cad la/ /zhen pa med cing rmongs pa med/ /gang
286b7(dkon brtsegs): zag des ni nyon mongs rnams/ /legs pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa la/ /nyes dmigs rnams ni skye ba nas/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi bar dag gi/ /rgyu dang rgyu yi rgyu nyid dang / /de bzhin
286b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu yi bya ba rnams/ /thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /des ni mig zad mtha' yi rgyu/ /gang yin rab tu rtogs pas na/ /rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas/ /mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur/ /des
287a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mig gi skye mtha' dang / mtha' dang rab tu dben pa dang / /'jug pa dang ni med pa dang / /mi skye ba nas nyer zhi'i bar/ /'di la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyang / /rab tu rtogs par gyur bas na/ /
287a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas/ /mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur/ /des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /brjod pa 'jig rten rjes su ni/ /btags pa yin pas de la ni/ /yang dag ci yang med par rtogs/ /
287a3(dkon brtsegs): des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi/ /brjod pa 'jig rten rjes su ni/ /yang dag ci yang med par rtogs/ /des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang / /ci yang med dang skye med nas/ /nye bar zhi
287a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams/ /'jig rten rjes su btags pas na/ /de la yang dag med par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /brjod pa
287a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las/ /byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi/ /brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las/ /byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des
287a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang / /ci yang med dang skye med nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang / /'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus pa las/ /byung ba nyid
287a7(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /brjod pa'i rang bzhin bstan med par/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ des ni mig gi phyi
287a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yi/ /brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang / /mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang / /ci yang med dang skye
287b1(dkon brtsegs): med nas/ /nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang / 'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bstan med par/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /de la zhen pa ci yang med/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /
287b2(dkon brtsegs): yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /des ni 'dod chags sangs rgyas lam/ /rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /
287b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la ni zhen pa med/ /sangs rgyas lam ni thams cad kun/ /nyon mongs las ni btsal bar bya/ /rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgor ni zhugs pa yin/ /'dod chags kun 'dzin
287b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / /kun 'dzin 'dod chags yin ston cing / /rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgor ni slob pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dod chags gang mchod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /
287b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgor ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des ni zhe sdang sangs rgyas lam/ /rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur bas na/ /zhe sdang la ni zhen pa med/ /
287b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang kun 'dzin yin pa dang / /kun 'dzin zhe sdang yin ston cing / /rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gang mchod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /
287b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des ni gti mug sangs rgyas lam/ /rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni/ /rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na/ /gti mug la ni zhen pa
287b8(dkon brtsegs): med/ /gal te gti mug nyid kyi mtha'/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur na/ /des ni sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs pas/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gti mug kun 'dzin yin pa dang / /kun 'dzin
288a1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug yin ston cing / /rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i
288a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de ni chos la mchod pa yin/ /chos la mchod pa byas pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang
288a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa/ /de ni dge 'dun mchod pa yin/ /dge 'dun la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de ni tshul khrims mchod pa yin/ /tshul khrims la ni
288a4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa yin/ /brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /

288a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa/ /de bzhin nyid la mchod pa yin/ /de bzhin nyid la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /skye ba med la mchod pa yin/ /skye ba med la
288a8(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'gag pa med la mchod pa yin/ 'gag pa med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de
288b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /zag pa med la mchod pa yin/ /zag pa med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /ci yang med la mchod pa yin/ /ci yang med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin
288b2(dkon brtsegs): sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /dpag tu med la mchod pa yin/ /dpag tu med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /srid pa
288b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum la mchod pa yin/ /srid pa gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /rab dben la ni mchod pa yin/ /rab dben la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun
288b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'khor bar 'jug la mchod pa yin/ /'khor bar 'jug la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug
288b5(dkon brtsegs): gang mchod pa/ /'jug pa med la mchod pa yin/ /'jug pa med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /yod pa min la mchod pa yin/ /yod pa
288b6(dkon brtsegs): min la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /byung ba med la mchod pa yin/ /byung ba med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /
288b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /nye bar zhi la mchod pa yin/ /nye bar zhi la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ 'ong ba med la mchod pa yin/ /
288b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'gro ba med la mchod pa yin/ /'gro ba med la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par
289a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'dus byas la ni mchod pa yin/ /'dus byas la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /sdug
289a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal la sogs mchod pa yin/ /sdug bsngal la sogs mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /sdug bsngal shes la mchod pa yin/ /sdug bsngal
289a3(dkon brtsegs): shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /kun 'byung shes la mchod pa yin/ /kun 'byung shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par
289a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /'gog pa shes la mchod pa yin/ /'gog pa shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /lam shes la ni
289a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa yin/ /lam shes la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /chos shes la ni mchod pa yin/ /chos shes la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin
289a6(dkon brtsegs): sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /rjes la shes la mchod pa yin/ /rjes la shes la mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /skye
289a7(dkon brtsegs): med ye shes mchod pa yin/ /skye med ye shes mchod pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ /zad pa'i ye shes mchod pa yin/ /zad pa'i ye shes mchod pa'i
289a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin yang dag spong ba dang / /dran pa nyer gzhag rdzu 'phrul rkang / /dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / /byang chub yan lag bdun po dang / /yan lag brgyad pa'i
289b1(dkon brtsegs): lam dag dang / /zhi gnas lhag mthong la sogs pa/ /chos ni rnam par dgu po rnams/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems
289b2(dkon brtsegs): can gang la la zhig theg pa la gnas nas/ gong du ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas gang zag rnam pa brgyad bcu yongs su sdang bar bya'o/ /rnam pa brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha bsad pa
289b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom ba bsad pa dang / gnod sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mtshal phyung ba dang / dge 'dun 'thun pa gshig pa dang / rkun bur rab tu byung ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / dbang po
289b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang ldan pa dang / log par lta ba dang / log par sems pa dang / log par smra ba dang / log pa'i lam can dang / log par 'tsho ba dang / log par brtson pa dang / /log pa'i dran pa can dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin
289b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa dang / gnas mi shes pa dang / /dus mi shes pa dang / tshod mi shes pa dang / lam mi shes pa dang / tshad mi shes pa dang / bdag dang gzhan mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang /
289b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i gnas rnams la gus pa med pa dang / bag yod pa dang spyod yul khyad par du 'phags pa dag la btsun par mi 'dzin pa dang / chos mi shes pa dang / 'dul ba mi shes pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas mi shes
289b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang lci ba dang yang ba mi shes pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang ral ba mi shes pa dang / gzhan yang spyod pa shin tu phra ba dang rags pa mi shes pa dang / las ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba mi
289b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / dngos po dman pa rnams mi shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sgrub par bskul ba dang /
290a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i lam yang dag pa la skyo zhing spong bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod lam nyams pa dang / lam ma yin pa spyod pa dang / bdag yod par
290a2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / sems can yod par smra ba dang / srog yod par smra ba dang / gang zag yod par smra ba dang / bsam pa shin du dman zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skyed par byed pa dang / chad par lta ba dang /
290a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta ba dang / stong zhing rgyu med par lta ba dang / yod pa mi mthong ba dang / med pa mi mthong ba dang / las mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus mi mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa dang / las kyi rgyu mi shes pa
290a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / dbang po rnams mi shes pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / khams mi shes pa dang / khams kyi rgyu mi shes pa dang /
290a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba mi shes pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / lam mi shes pa dang / lam gyi rgyu mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / gtong ba
290a6(dkon brtsegs): mi shes pa dang / gtong ba'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / skye shi mi shes pa dang / skye shi'i rgyu mi shes pa
290a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa mi shes pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang / zad pa dang zad pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / yod pa dang yod pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / mtha' dang mtha'
290a8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / dben pa dang dben pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug pa ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid ma yin pa mi shes pa dang / skye ba dang skye ba ma yin pa mi
290b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / 'gag pa dang 'gag pa ma yin pa mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/ gzhon nu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gong du ji skad du bstan pa'i gzungs mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i gang zag
290b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad bcu po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' dang / /zad mtha' dag ni mi rtogs pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la rmongs pas/ /
290b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas yongs su spang bar bya/ /gang zhig mig la bdag med dang / /sems can med par rtogs gyur pa/ /des ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig ni skye zad dang / /yi ge spangs par
290b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig gi dben pa dang / /gnas pa med par rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang
290b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig gi rang bzhin nyid/ /gnas pa med par rtogs gyur pas/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig la 'jug med dang / /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med rtogs pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas
290b6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /mkhas pa yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig la skye med dang / /rang bzhin zhi bar rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig ni rang bzhin gyis/ /mig gi mtshan nyid spangs pas na/ /
290b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa dang / /bstan du med par rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /gang zhig mig ni rang bzhin gyis/ /mig gi mtshan nyid spangs pas na/ /su yang sems shing 'dzin pa dang / /
290b8(dkon brtsegs): bshad du med par rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsten par bya/ /de bzhin gzungs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /yi ges brjod bya ma yin pas/ /phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin la/ /sems kyis kyang ni phyin mi 'gyur/ /
291a1(dkon brtsegs): chos de la ni dga' ba med/ /zhe sdang la yang gnas pa min/ /ri rgyal bzhin du mi g.yo bas/ /rjod par byed kyang dmigs su med/ /kun 'dzin yang dag yod ma yin/ /bdag kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /
291a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag ni rang bzhin stong / /kun 'dzin yang ni yod mi 'gyur/ /kun 'dzin rang bzhin stong yin na/ /byis pas yod par rab tu brtags/ /yang dag ma yin brtags pas na/ /ma thos par yang mya ngan skyed/ /gang
291a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'dod dang kun 'dzin dag / stong pa nyid du rnam rtog pa/ /rtog pa gnyis po de dag kyang / /mthar ni gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur/ /gal te stong nyid stong rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin dag kyang yod mi 'gyur/ /byang chub
291a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag bar dag dang / /ting 'dzin dag kyang stong pa yin/ /gang zhig kun 'dzin stong nyid dang / /ting 'dzin dag gi bar dag kyang / /rab tu rtogs par gyur na ni/ /mig kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mig ni zad
291a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha'/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig ni skye ba'i mtha'/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang
291a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rtogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi mtha' yi rnams/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig ni
291a7(dkon brtsegs): rab dben pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug pa dag /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni
291a8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig ni yod min pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig
291b1(dkon brtsegs): ni nyer zhi ba/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig ni 'gyur ba yi/ /zad mtha' yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang
291b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi/ /skye mtha' yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig
291b3(dkon brtsegs): gi 'gyur ba yi/ /mthar ni yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi/ /rab dben yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang

291b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yi/ /med pa yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi/ /skye med yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /
291b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi/ /nyer zhi yang dag bzhin rtogs na/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ /mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni
291b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig mig gi sngon mtha' la/ /'gyur dang tha dang mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin
291b8(dkon brtsegs): sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi zad mtha' la/ /'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med 'gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' la/ /'gyur
292a1(dkon brtsegs): dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi mtha' dag la/ /'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med
292a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi nyer zhi la/ /'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug pa la/ /'gyur
292a3(dkon brtsegs): dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi med pa la/ /'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas
292a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi skye med la/ /'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi nyer zhi la/ /'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med/ /len dang
292a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ 'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /'dod sdang gti mug nga rgyal che/ /
292a6(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog ser sna sgyu mya ngan/ /nyes dmigs dri ma zug rngu dang / /chu bo dkar nag las rnams dang / /skye ba med dang 'gag med dang / /'gro ba med dang 'ong med dang / /mi g.yo tha dad mi 'gyur dang / /byas min spyod pa ma yin
292a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /snang min mun pa ma yin dang / /'jug min chu bo spangs pa dang / /zag pa med dang gnas med dang / /'gro min mi 'gro ma yin dang / /yi ge ma yin dmigs min dang / /'byung ba ma yin 'jug min dang / /yang
292a8(dkon brtsegs): dag ma yin rnam rtog sogs/ /sgo ni drug bcu rtsa gnyis rnams/ /so so'i don dang ci rigs par/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig mig gi sngon mtha' yi/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang
292b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi zad mtha' yi/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi skye
292b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yi/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi mtha' dag gi/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun
292b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi rab dben pa'i/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi 'jug pa yi/ /rab dang tha ma'i
292b4(dkon brtsegs): bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig ni med pa yi/ rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig
292b5(dkon brtsegs): mig ni mi skye ba'i/ /rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing / len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig mig gi nyer zhi ba'i/ /rab dang tha ma'i rab shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa/ /
292b6(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /sa la 'gyur ba med pa dang / /len dang rnam rtog med
292b7(dkon brtsegs): par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtog gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa ni mi skye 'du shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa
292b8(dkon brtsegs): ni 'gag med 'du shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa la 'jug par 'du shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang
293a1(dkon brtsegs): zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa la nges 'byung 'du shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa
293a2(dkon brtsegs): la smon med 'du shes shing / /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /sa la gnas med 'du shes shing / /'gro ba med dang 'ong med dang / /mtha' med dang ni zad
293a3(dkon brtsegs): med dang / /mtshungs par ldan dang mtshungs mi ldan/ /ming dang yi ge brtags bral dang / /so sor brtags dang 'jug pa dang / /gnyen po mi 'thun phyogs med dang / /brjod du med cing bstan med dang / /rab dben
293a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa dang / /dran pa nye gzhag yang dag spong / /rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs/ /byang chub yan lag mi 'jigs lam/ /de ltar sa'i chos rnams la/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig
293a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la 'jug med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la 'byung med
293a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la mtshan med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun
293a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la smon med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la gnas med pas/ /len dang rnam
293a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la skye med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs
293b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /gal te bdag la 'gag med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag la yig med pas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /
293b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /gal te bdag ni yig bral bas/ /len dang rnam rtog med par ni/ /de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ /kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed/ /mig gi sngon dang
293b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi mtha' dag / rtag chad dag ni spangs pa dang / /rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong par ni/ /'dren pas thabs kyis bstan rig byos/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na/ de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /
293b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chos bstan zhes mi bya/ /gal te chos ni sems pa'i tshe/ /mig gi mtshan nyid rtog byed na/ de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos sems pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni sgom pa'i tshe/ /mig gi mtshan nyid
293b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos sgom pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gang zhig mig gi stong nyid rtogs/ /byang chub gzhol bar mi byed na/ /sangs rgyas gang zag de dag la/ /rtag tu mngon sum chos ston
293b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ /gal te mig ni ma rtogs na/ /gzugs kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur la/ /gal te mig ni rtogs gyur na/ /gzugs kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /gal te mig ni rtog gyur na/ /gzugs kyang rab
293b7(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs 'gyur la/ /gal te gzugs ni rtogs gyur na/ /mig kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skyed pa'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de
293b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /rgyu yi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /'bras bu'i mtshan

294a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /bsags pa dag tu rtogs

294a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ /'dod chags dag ni skye mi 'gyur/ /rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/ /khams
294a6(dkon brtsegs): ni sna tshogs rtogs byed na/ /de ni mi bden rtog yin pas/ /chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o/ /yi dam dag ni mi nyams shing / ngo bo nyid stong rtogs pa dang / /ting 'dzin sgo rnams thob gyur pa/ /des ni chos legs ston
294a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /yi dam dag ni mi nyams shing / /mig la rtog pa spangs pa ni/ /rnam rtog med par gyur pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos legs ston par 'gyur/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin dag la
294a8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs/ /'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos rab bstan
294b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /tshig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /
294b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos rab bstan par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya/ /gal te mig nyid
294b3(dkon brtsegs): stong shes na/ /mig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur/ /'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ /des ni chos rab bstan par bya/ /mig nyid stong par ma shes na/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag la rmongs/ /'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir/ /des

294b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gnas rtog byed pas/ /rjes su 'thun pa kho nar ni/ /sems can rnams ni gdul mi nus/ /mig gi yod med ma rtogs par/ /'khor gyi nang du chos ston pa/ /de ni rnying la gdu bas na/ /thams cad yid ches len
294b6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ /mig gi yod med rtogs gyur na/ /'khor gyi nang du chos ston pas/ /des ni mngon zhen med pas na/ /thams cad yid ches len par byed/ /mig nyid stong par ma rtogs par/ /chos kyi stan la 'dug nas ni/ /
294b7(dkon brtsegs): dpe mang dag gis rab bstan kyang / /thams cad yid ches len mi byed/ /gal te mig nyid stong shes na/ /chos kyi stan la 'dug nas ni/ /dpe rnams kyis ni ston byed na/ /thams cad yid ches len par byed/ /
294b8(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/ /yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ /'jig rten skyed pa'i ming gi bar/ /thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ zla 'od gzhon
295a1(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
295a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las 'od zer kun tu bkye ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// gsum zhus rgya/ //'phags
295a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu gnyis pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bo d+hi

295a5(dkon brtsegs): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na dbyar gnas su gnas nas zla ba gsum 'das te dgag dbye mdzad nas/ chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas dge slong stong nyis brgya
295a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang /
295a7(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs can sna tshogs dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
295a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bla mar byas/ bkur stir byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad bzang po
295b1(dkon brtsegs): mang po yang brnyes so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
295b2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te/ des lhar bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas
295b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten 'di dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams zil gyis mnan te/ rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon du byas nas bsgrubs te/ bzhugs shing de chos ston pa ni tshangs
295b4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to zhes bcom ldan 'das

295b6(dkon brtsegs): byon nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon
295b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa/ phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ nor dang / yo byad mang ba/ gser dngul mang ba/ nor dang 'brus yongs su gang ba'i mdzod dang / bang ba mang ba/ nor
295b8(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru mang ba/ glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / lug mang ba/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang pa zhig gnas te/
296a1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i rigs las mngon par byung nas/ /dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rgyal po'i
296a2(dkon brtsegs): khab kyi grong khyer chen por byon nas de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
