319b3(dkon brtsegs): to/ /ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /'jig rten kun la sman pa'i slad/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /
319b4(dkon brtsegs): de ring su yis sa bon btab/ /de ring su la lung yang ston/ /gang zhig thar phyir rab tu zhugs/ /dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /thub pa ci
319b5(dkon brtsegs): slad 'dzum pa bstan/ /'od zer don ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar gsungs pa/ 'jig rten
319b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon po skyob pa la/ /ci 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyis/ /bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas na/ /de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/ /gnod sbyin 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /sum bcu rtsa
319b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sum bcu gsum nas shi 'phos nas/ /'thab bral du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral nas ni dga' ldan 'gro/ /'dod la 'dod pas dgar byas nas/ /mi yi nang
319b8(dkon brtsegs): du skye 'gyur te/ /rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ldan par 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur ba mi yi dbang / /gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste/ /mi yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro bar
320a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni/ /rtag tu sti stang byas par 'gyur/ /lha yi nang dang mi nang du/ /yang dang yang ni kun tu 'gro/ /phyis de rgyal srid bor nas ni/ /khyim med
320a2(dkon brtsegs): par yang rab tu 'byung / /rkyen gyis byang chub thob 'gyur te/ /der ni mtha' yang thug par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin dag ni sum khri rnams/ /gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas/ /sum bcu rtsa
320a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byams pa mthong gyur cing / /de na mthar ni thug 'gyur te/ /dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na/ /ston pa la ni su mi
320a4(dkon brtsegs): mchod/ /gnod sbyin stong du tshangs pa rnams/ /byang chub mchog la rab zhugs pas/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /nam du'ang ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /kha cig srog chags kun phan phyir/ /byang
320a5(dkon brtsegs): chub dam pa rab tshol zhing / /sangs rgyas 'dren pa stong rnams la/ /bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /kha cig sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/ /stong phrag gnyis dang gsum dag kyang / /me tog phreng ba dri rnams kyis/ /
320a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/ /'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la/ /kha cig bkur sti byed 'gyur te/ /'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg /de na ci 'jig de yi bu/ /ri bo zhes bya
320a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur ces/ /des kyang sems ni bskyed par gyur/ /des ni sangs rgyas sti stang byas/ /thams cad du yang smon lam btab/ /nga mthong nas ni mchod byas
320a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ /byang chub phyir ni sems btud do/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /ngan 'gro thams cad spangs gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni/ /gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur/ /gdugs rnams
320b1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phul nas ni/ /na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur/ /na bza' bye ba phul nas ni/ /de nyid tu yang rab tu 'byung / /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing / /lo yang lnga
320b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya tshang bar ni/ /tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod/ /gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/ /de snyed bskal par spyod par 'gyur/ /dper
320b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa ni de snyed du/ /de dag khyed kyis shes par gyis/ /de dag dper yang shes nas ni/ /de bas lhag par spyad par gyis/ /sdar ni dpe rnams gang brjod pa/ /gang gA ye ni bye snyed kyi/ /de snyed sangs
320b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong gyur nas/ /de dag kun la sti stang byed/ /e ma'o ye shes e ma shes/ /e ma'o bla na med pa'i sems/ /sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni/ /de ltar zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyis sems
320b5(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi mchog / sangs rgyas su yang de 'gyur te/ /de na de yi mtshan btags pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags/ /lo ni bye ba bdun bcur yang / /srog chags rnams la chos bstan te/ /phyis
320b6(dkon brtsegs): gdod rkang gnyis gtso bo ni/ /de na mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /rab tu dul ba'i sems rnams kyi/ /'dus pa dag ni nyi shur 'gyur/ /de la tha ma gcig po ni/ /dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur/ /'dus pa rnams
320b7(dkon brtsegs): ni gang brjod pa'i/ /nyan thos dpag tu med pa ste/ /de yi nyan thos ji snyed pa/ /byang chub zhugs pa 'ang de snyed do/ /sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das/ /lo ni brgya
320b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag stong dag du/ /de yi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/ /bskal pa lnga brgya tshang bar ni/ /sangs rgyas mang por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa cig la 'ang 'byung ba ni/ /de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi
321a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams mkhas pa gang dag ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams bsnyen 'dod pa/ /tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang / /rab tu 'dun pa nyid du bya/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par spongs/ /tshul
321a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin la ni rtag tu sgoms/ /mang du thos pa rab tu bya/ /des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i don ni chos bzhi ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang gtong / /
321a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang / /bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog /byang chub kyi ni lam yang bstan/ /the tshom gcod pa bzang po yis/ /nyan thos kyis ni lam bstan to/ /sems can gang
321a4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di 'dod pa/ /de la ngas ni skabs dbye 'o/ /chos rnams kyi ni mchog ston pa/ /'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed par dka'/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bcom
321a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs shes grag gis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po zhig bskyed do snyam mo/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs
321a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs kyis/ de la
321a7(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang / ci nus kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la spro ba skyed cig /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yogs dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi
321a8(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po nas gzung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam de thams cad gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma rnams med par byas so/ /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag
321b1(dkon brtsegs): par byas so/ /lam de dag thams cad bsal nas spos kyi chus kun du chag chag btab bo/ /lam der gos ni mtshams med par bting ngo / /lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis chal par bkram
321b2(dkon brtsegs): mo/ /lam de dag gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis shin du brgyan to/ /lam de bdug spos dam pa'i snying po rab kyi snod nas bdugs so/ /steng gi bar snang las dar gyi lda ldir
321b3(dkon brtsegs): spyangs te/ shin tu brgyan to/ /lam der sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol bar byas so/ /lam de nas mda' rgyang gang tshun chad tsam me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos khebs
321b4(dkon brtsegs): shing dur pa sgra 'byin par byas so/ /lam de gser glebs pas rab tu g.yogs so/ /lam de gser gyi dra ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab tu g.yogs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi
321b5(dkon brtsegs): bu de lta bu'i bkod pa byas nas lus chen po mngon par sprul te/ 'khor dang bcas pa dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' ste/ mos shing yid bde ba skyes nas/ /dga' ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems
321b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / rnam par dang ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / rab tu sim pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems dang / chos la gzhol ba'i sems
321b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang / byang chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las
321b8(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
322a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snod tu gyur pa'i sems dang / snying po'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / mi phyed pa'i sems dang / ma zhigs pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
322a2(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad bsgrub pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
322a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la
322a4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog /chos rnams kyi ni dam pa ston/ /'jig rten mgon la bdag gis ni/ /bla na ma mchis mchod pa bgyis/ /
322a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te/ /mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas/ /sems can don rnams bgyid par shog /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang / /dpe
322a6(dkon brtsegs): byad bzang po brgyad bcur ldan/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /'jig rten snang bar byed par shog /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /snyan pa'i chos ni rab ston cing / /rnam pa bcu gnyis
322a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog /rgyal ba ji ltar de bzhin du/ /chos 'phrul rnams ni rab ston cing / /srog chags bye ba du ma yi/ /sems can rnams kyi don bgyid shog /dpa' chen gang
322a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma byon pa/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad ltar/ /byang chub dam pa rab rtogs nas/ /lam de rab tu ston par shog /sems can ldongs pa kun gyi phyir/ /mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te/ /gnas
322b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rten dang skyabs dag dang / /de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog /ji ltar 'dren pa grol mdzad bzhin/ /'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yi/ /srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog /bdag gis sdug
322b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun las dgrol/ /'jig rten na ni mtshungs pa yod med pa/ /lha dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa/ /gzi brjid dag ni mtha' yas 'od mdzad pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod
322b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyis/ /bdag ni las mchog dam pa 'di dag gis/ /mi dbang sa steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin/ /bsod nams rab mchog sum bcu gnyis mtshan ldan/ /chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog /
322b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa/ chos kyi dam pa rnams kyi phyir/ /ston pa'i rim gro gang byed pa/ sems can rnams
322b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchog yin te/ /de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /'jig rten snang mdzad mchog la ni/ /lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis/ /mchod par bya bar 'os par 'gyur/ /byang
322b6(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog tu sangs rgyas nas/ /shing mchog drung du rab 'dug ste/ /sdig can bdud las rgyal nas su/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha stong phrag du ma dang / gnod
322b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / srin po stong phrag du ma dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun
322b8(dkon brtsegs): du bdar nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen
323a1(dkon brtsegs): pos/ 'od zer ni rab tu 'gye/ zhing ni rab tu g.yo bar byas/ me tog gi char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig ni rab tu 'khrol bar byas te/ gnod sbyin ci
323a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon par byas pa bzhin du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad ma la zhabs bzhag ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ tshe
323a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mchog chos kyi gdan/ gdan dam pa/ gdan bzang po/ 'jig rten gsum po kun las khyad par du 'phags
323a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig /de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs te/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la snying brtse ba dang /
323a5(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i mdo sde sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'chad par
323a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de yang sems can thams cad the tshom du gyur pa la rab tu ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom skye ba gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs
323a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/ de na lha bye ba drug bcu rtsa brgyad kyis ras bcos ma re re de bzhin gshegs pa
323a8(dkon brtsegs): la phul te/ de dag kyang der gdan du bting bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa/
323b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ni/ /lha yi gos rab dam pa mchog /lha yis rab tu bting ba la/ /de la rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs/ /thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs par
323b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ma thag / 'jig rten rnam pa drug g.yos shing / /skye bo rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas/ /de na rab tu snang bar gyur/ /de na chos 'dod rnams la ni/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas rdzu
323b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul ston/ /lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang / /grul bum yi dags srul po rnams/ /de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste/ /sgrib pa dag ni med par gyur/ /lha rnams bye ba phrag stong dang / khrag khrig phrag ni
323b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya rnams dag / rnyed dga' yi ni tshig gsung pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lta/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang / de tshe blon pos yongs bskor cing / /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po mchog /
323b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur/ /ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang / /mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang / srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas/ /'jig rten the
323b6(dkon brtsegs): tshom gang yod pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog la dris shig dang / /the tshom dag ni dris pa rnams/ /rnam par 'dren pa ngas bcad do/ /de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji
323b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed 'dus nas/ chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis dal bar shes nas/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams te/ phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir rna ba blags te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas
323b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu chen po dge slong ma 'dus pa rnams la soms la ma lhags pa rnams kyang tshol te/ rgyang ring po na
324a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams kyang sdus shig / /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos
324a2(dkon brtsegs): bsams te/ bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen
324a3(dkon brtsegs): po longs shig bcom ldan 'das 'di lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud tu bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang / lha dang mi
324a4(dkon brtsegs): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te/ ston pas bka' stsal gyis/ btsun pa 'od srung bdag cag gnyis kyi chos kyi bar chad tu 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dod do/ /de skad ces smras
324a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod song shig dang / kho bo yang khyod song ba'i rjes bzhin
324a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos stan de la 'phrul pa sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor
324a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod gyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang
324a8(dkon brtsegs): du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu gdug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de mthong nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /tshe
324b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug par mthong ste/ mthong nas
324b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'od srung khyod stan ga la ba de nas sprul te/ sprul nas mgyogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/ spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring bzhin tu 'khor kyi nang
324b3(dkon brtsegs): na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa ni myur ba la sten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras
324b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na 'di la kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa lta ci zhig tu 'gyur/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi
324b5(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // bam po gsum pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
324b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
324b7(dkon brtsegs): skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
324b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung
325a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos du
325a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dag lags/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / lus kyi
325a3(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / lus kyi las ma g.yos pa dang / ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang / yid kyi las ma g.yos pa rnams
325a4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa rnams lags/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ sems can thams cad
325a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang / rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / mu stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang / sgrol ba po dang / pha rol du
325a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar gyur pa dang / gnas dang mgon dang skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bzlog par mi nus pa rnams lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
325a7(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de nyid kun zhus pa/ gang gis byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /dpa' bo de yi don ci lags/ /gang gis dam pa 'tshang rgya ba/ /yon tan chos rnams brjod
325a8(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /dpa' bo de dag ji ltar spyod/ /ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas/ /mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por rab gnas nas/ /
325b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig can dag ni ji ltar 'dul/ /bye ba dag gi zhing bskyod nas/ /ji ltar byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gi don/ /'di 'dra'i tshig ni ci zhig lags/ /sangs rgyas
325b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mchog rnams dang / /byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod gsol/ /srog chags kun las sman slad du/ /pad ma bzhin du ma chags shing / /sems can bye ba grol mdzad par/ /
325b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di ni ji ltar spyod/ /mkhas pa lha dang klu dag dang / /mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis/ /ji lta bur ni mchod 'gyur ba/ /zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom
325b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med
325b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na sangs
325b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta
325b7(dkon brtsegs): bu/ byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu bsam pa zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i phyir
325b8(dkon brtsegs): snying po'o/ /brtan pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba'i phyir brtan pa'o/ /ma 'khrul ba'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/ /shin du gnas pa'i phyir ma 'khrul pa'o/ /mi zlogs pa'i phyir shin tu gnas
326a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /sems can la lta ba'i phyir mi zlogs pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la lta ba'o/ /yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o/ /sems can
326a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo ba'o/ /bdag la bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o/ /lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i
326a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdag bde ba ma yin pa'o/ /zang zing med pa'i phyir/ lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'o/ /sems can gyi phyir 'brang pas zang zing med pa'o/ /mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'i phyir sems can
326a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi phyir 'brang ba'o/ /mgon du gyur pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'o/ /skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyi phyir mgon du gyur pa'o/ /ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no/ /shin tu yang dag
326a5(dkon brtsegs): par brtags pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o/ /rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'o/ /bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o/ /ci yang med pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba'o/ /shin du yongs
326a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'i phyir ci yang med pa'o/ /rab tu byung bar byas pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su dag pa'o/ /nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o/ /phyi shin du yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o/ /de ltar shA
326a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu mi phyed pas snying po zhes bya ba nas phyi shin du yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'i bar du ste/ bsam pa ni de lta bu'o/ /byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad
326a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi rdzi ba'o/ /sems de ni theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'brel ba med pa'o/ /sems de ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brtan pa'o/ /sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed
326b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /sems de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir rtag pa'o/ /sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/ /sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /
326b2(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o/ /sems de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad nges par phigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o/ /sems de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la mi
326b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/ /sems de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/ /sems de ni shes rab kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o/ /sems
326b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni sems can thams cad la bskabs 'byed pa'i phyir rgya che ba'o/ /sems de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o/ /sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med
326b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /sems de ni snying rje chen po ma bcad pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /sems de ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i phyir mngon du 'gro bar bya'o/ /sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
326b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o/ /sems de ni bde ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas so/ /sems de ni tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byung pa'o/ /sems de ni bzod pas bsnyen par dka' ba'o/ /
326b7(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni brtson 'grus kyis thul bar dka' ba'o/ /sems de ni bsam gtan dag gis nye bar zhi ba'o/ /sems de ni shes rab kyi tshogs kyis gnod pa med pa'o/ /yang sems de ni de bzhin
326b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/ sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol
327a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/ /sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad
327a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rtsa ba'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems de lta
327a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /sems can rgya chen po sems can mchog rab ces bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/ /lus
327a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag gi las yongs su dag
327a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin/ ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/ yid kyi las ma g.yos pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
327a6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa yin/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/ sems
327a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / mu stegs su gyur pa dang / zam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa
327a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgrol bar gyur pa dang pha rol tu 'gro ba dang / gnas dang mgon dang / skyabs dang dpung gnyen yin no/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis
327b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyod par mi nus pa yin no/ /de ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dad pa yin no/ /dad pa mang ba dang /
327b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/ ser sna med cing lhug par gtong ba dang / lag brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba dang / sbyin pa bged pa la
327b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems yin/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / de las dang las kyi
327b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la mngon par dad pa dang / rab tu rtog cing yid ches pa dang / the tshom med cing som nyi med pa yin no/ /de nag po dang / dkar po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi stor bar shes pas
327b5(dkon brtsegs): srog gis phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin te/ de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub
327b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / tshil kyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong ba yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang
327b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par len cing spyod do/ /de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang /
327b8(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang dul ba dang / zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba dang / rtsod pa'i smra ba med pa dang / mi snyan par smra ba med pa dang /
328a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dge zhing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / rgod pa med pa dang /
328a2(dkon brtsegs): khengs pa ma yin pa dang / yab yab po med pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig ma 'dres pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / sems shin du mnyam par bzhag pa de dag dang / ji ltar
328a3(dkon brtsegs): srid par 'dren pa bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / yang srid pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
328a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas de dag la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur byed cing mgu bar byed kyi/ yid
328a5(dkon brtsegs): byung bar mi byed do/ /dga' bar byed kyi/ mi dga' bar mi byed de/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byas pas de la chos kyis phan 'dogs par byed de/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/
328a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sbyin pas longs spyod chen po 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas
328a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /'di ni sbyin pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / 'di ni ser sna/ 'di ni ser sna'i 'bras bu/ 'di ni
328a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims/ 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims/ 'di ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni bzod pa/ 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa/
328b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gnod sems/ 'di ni gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni brtson 'grus/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni le lo/ /'di ni le lo'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni bsam
328b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan/ 'di ni bsam gtan rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni sems g.yeng ba/ 'di ni sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni shes rab/ 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal
328b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes rab/ 'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod
328b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i
328b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par
328b6(dkon brtsegs): smin pa/ 'di ni dge ba/ 'di ni mi dge ba/ 'di ni bya ba/ 'di ni mi bya ba/ 'di byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ 'di ni byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang /
328b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston te/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
328b8(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ snod tu gyur par yang shes nas zab mo'i gtam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang /
329a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / srog med pa'i gtam
329a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam rab tu ston to/ /'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i
329a3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
329a4(dkon brtsegs): reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa len pa rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre
329a5(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di yod
329a6(dkon brtsegs): na 'di 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya
329a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du ste/ 'di la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/
329a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la chos gang yang 'grub pa med/ ldog pa med/ rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pas khams gsum 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa'i
329b1(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / sdug bsngal gyi lam 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags nas chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa po ma yin no/ /gang la byed pa po
329b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la don dam pa bya ba yang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med/ 'jig pa med do zhes brjod do/ /des de lta bu'i chos zab mo thos nas the tshom mi za/ som nyi mi byed cing chos
329b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ mig dang gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes
329b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi chags/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang / chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes dad ngo / /shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa
329b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/ chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su mi nyams so/ /de
329b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la lta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
329b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/ de dang de dag tu skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas
329b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu pho dang / bu mo 'dod par mi 'gyur/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag mi 'dod par 'gyur/ yongs su gzung ba thams cad kyi ngor lta ba mi 'dod
330a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de skyes nas 'dod pa la ma rtses par na tshod gzhon nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dad pas
330a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtog pas dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas
330a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams nyan cing sgrub pa snying por byed par 'gyur te/ tshig lhur byed pa'i blo dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ /mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ji ltar thos pa'i chos
330a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzhan la yang rgya chen yang dag par rab tu ston te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi re zhing rang gi tshig yongs su mi
330a5(dkon brtsegs): spong bar gzhan la chos ston te/ ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan la chos ston to/ /chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can thams
330a6(dkon brtsegs): la snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de mang du thos pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chogs shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa dang / nges par 'gyur/ gso
330a7(dkon brtsegs): sla ba dang / dgang sla ba dang / dgon pa la dga' ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog pa dang don la rton gyi yi ge la mi rton pa yin/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
330a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi rten du 'gyur/ bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i
330b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ /bag yod pa lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
330b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po yang dag par sdom pa'o/ /de la dbang po yang dag par sdom pa gang zhe na/ gang mig gis gzugs mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ gzugs la chags pa dang / nyes
330b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du rna bas sgra dang / snas dri dang / lces ro dang / lus kyis rig bya dang / yid kyis chos shes nas mtshan mar mi
330b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ chos rnams la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bag yod
330b5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba ni gang bdag gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
330b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba
330b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi 'byung ba dang / gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa mi 'byung ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa
330b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ba de ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni gang yod pa de yang yod
331a1(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu shes/ gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so/ /de la ci yod ci med ce na/ yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do/ /log pa la rab
331a2(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyor ba la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do/ /gang gi las rnam par smin pa de ni med do/ /gzhan yang mig ni yod do/ /gang gi mig de ni med do/ /rna ba
331a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ni yod do/ /gang gi yid de ni med do/ /gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do/ /gzugs rtag pa dang / brtan pa
331a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / ther zug pa dang / de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal
331a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag
331a6(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do/ /gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyi/ ma rig pa med na/ 'du byed med pa nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du yod kyi/ skye ba med na rga shi med
331a7(dkon brtsegs): do/ /gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do/ /tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do/ /'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su
331a8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ni med do/ /thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /'chal ba'i shes rab kyis shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni med do/ /sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do/ /sgom pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur
331b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni med do/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas kun tu sbyor ba ni yod do/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'bral ba ni med do/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang
331b2(dkon brtsegs): chub yod do/ /le lo can la ni byang chub med do/ /nga rgyal med pa la ni rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod do/ /nga rgyal can la ni mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/ /gzhan yang thams cad tu song ba'i stong pa nyid
331b3(dkon brtsegs): ni yod do/ /le lo la ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag go zhes bya ba de ni med do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang
331b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ni gang yod par 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod do zhes 'dogs so/ /gang med par 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dogs so/ /
331b5(dkon brtsegs): de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed/ med ces tha snyad tu 'dogs pa la yang yang dag par shes par mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs
331b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yang dag pa'i don kyang khong du chud de/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du
331b7(dkon brtsegs): byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtag par 'du
331b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni bde bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad
332a1(dkon brtsegs): do/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /mya ngan las 'das
332a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhi ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do/ /de 'du byed thams cad mi rtag
332a3(dkon brtsegs): go zhes thos nas shin tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go/ /'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas smon lam dang bral ba skyed do/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes thos nas stong pa nyid kyi
332a4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom mo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes thos nas mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed do/ /dus ma yin par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du
332a5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos las yongs su mi nyams te/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub
332a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// // gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
332a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos bcu la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes
332a8(dkon brtsegs): skyed do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/
332b1(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad pa nas ngo mtshar dang /
332b2(dkon brtsegs): rmad du 'du shes skyed pa'i bar du'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
332b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
332b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di
332b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam
332b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher
332b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir brtson 'grus tshar rtsom zhing mi zham mi 'gong mi skyo ste/ de
332b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du lus kyi lpags pa dang / rgyus pa dang / bri dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag zhig la/ lus kyi sha dang / khrag
333a1(dkon brtsegs): skams kyang sla'i/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya'o/ /snyam du de ltar sems skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam
333a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi don 'di nyid rgya
333a3(dkon brtsegs): cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni bsam mi khyab/ /chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/ /mtshan ma med cing snang med la/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras
333a4(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed/ /'gro ba tha dad ji snyed kyi/ /sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /thams cad tu ni chos sgrogs te/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang / /ji rtsam sems can thams cad kyi/ /dus
333a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum dag gi dbang po kun/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te/ /bsam mi khyab la rab tu dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas/ /'od zer dra bas bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho
333a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa/ /thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab/ /thub pa'i tshul khrims 'jig rten 'das/ /'jig rten chos la mi gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bsam yas la/ /byang chub
333a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab tu dad/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni/ /sems can kun gyis shes mi nus/ /chos kyi
333a8(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni dbyer med la/ /gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba/ /drang srong chen po'i ye shes stobs/ /nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa/ /sems can gcig gi don phyir yang / /bskal
333b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par/ /'dul ba'i don phyir bzhugs pas na/ /de dag snying rje de 'dra'o/ /sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan/ /dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang / /dris lan gcig gi tshin byed de/ /mi 'jigs pa ni bsam
333b2(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ /chos rnams thams cad thugs su chud/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams ma 'dres pa/ /thams cad tu ni ye shes gzigs/ /dad pa la ni rab gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas
333b3(dkon brtsegs): kun chos chos nyid rnams/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag la/ /de dag thams cad dad par byed/ /shA ri'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
333b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skye ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ mi gtsang ba dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang bral ba/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang /
333b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyus pa las rnam par grol ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
333b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ma gos pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags
333b8(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam
334a1(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa/ yongs su bsgoms pas yon tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yongs su dag pa'i me
334a2(dkon brtsegs): long gi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / chu la zla ba snang ba lta bu'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam gyis
334a3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa thams cad las log pas zag pa med pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'dus ma byas
334a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /nam mkha'i lta bu'i sku'o/ /mnyam pa med pa'i sku'o/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dpe med pa/ zla med pa/ mtshungs pa
334a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sku ste/ dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'o/ /de ni sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ da ltar
334a6(dkon brtsegs): byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye ba dang / rus dang / rigs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gzugs kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dpe byad bzang pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sems
334a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ lta bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ thos pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dran pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par rig
334a8(dkon brtsegs): pas rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'jig
334b1(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dor bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ spyod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ kha dog gis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rtags kyis rab tu phye ba
334b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ dbyibs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'ong bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'gro bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu phye
334b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ rnam par grol bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid mi 'thun pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chos kyi mtshan nyid
334b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ stobs su sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ snying rje chen
334b5(dkon brtsegs): pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
334b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / smon pa med pa las byung ba'i sku'o/ /mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i sku'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku'o/ /mi gnas pa'i sku'o/ /mi snyems pa'i sku'o/ /gnas
334b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o/ /gzugs med pa gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o/ /tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma
334b8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o/ /byung ba ma yin/ kun du byung ba ma yin/ ma byung ba ma yin pa'i sku'o/
335a1(dkon brtsegs): rmad tu byung ba rmad tu byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o/ /mig las byung ba ma yin/ gzugs su gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar
335a2(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ snas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ drir gtogs pa ma yin/ phyir rol ma yin/ lces bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lus dang ldan pa ma yin/
335a3(dkon brtsegs): reg byar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ sems la 'jug pa ma yin/ yid la 'jug pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma yin/ ldog pa ma yin/ rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang / mi
335a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
335a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /bcom ldan
335a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams spyad cing / /las rnams
335a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par/ /mtshungs med bde bar gshegs pa'i sku tshol lo/ /phyogs bcu 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang / /snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin/ /'dod la log par g.yem pa brtag spong zhing / /
335a8(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bu mchog gi sku tshol lo/ /gser ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni/ /dpag tu med pa gang gA'i byed ma snyed/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab sbyor cing / /rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'jig rten mchog la phul/
335b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yag gi rnga ma bzhin du tshul khrims srung / /yan lag nying lag bcad kyang dgra la bzod/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing / /sangs rgyas sku la smon pas yongs mi skyo/ /shes rab thabs dga' rgya chen bsam gtan pa/ /
335b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam pa lta/ /chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku/ /de 'drar bdag gyur ces ni de la smon/ /srid par 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing / /mi mchog gis ni byang chub mtshungs med thob/ /
335b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dri med gtsang zhing rdul grol ba/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thob bo/ /rang bzhin stong pa dag dang sems can bral/ /mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob/ /mig gi yul kun las ni rab 'das pa/ /de 'dra'i
335b4(dkon brtsegs): sku ni thub pas yang dag thob/ /gzod ma nas stong ma byas ma byung ba/ /gzugs dang sgra bral yid kyang rnam dag pa/ /de bzhin gshegs sku mi g.yo gang mthong ba/ /des ni phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa mthong / /ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna
335b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs lus/ /rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs/ /byis pa slu ba brdzun zhing phyin ci log /de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la blta bar byos/ /gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang / /ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang
335b6(dkon brtsegs): dag / chos nyid gcig gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha' 'dra/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon
335b7(dkon brtsegs): par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
335b8(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du
336a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu khyab par byed mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas dge slong gi 'khor la ni 'di bshad/
336a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ma'i 'khor la ni 'di/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor la ni 'di/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor la ni 'di/ bram ze'i 'khor la ni 'di/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ni 'di/ khyim bdag gi 'khor la ni 'di/ lha'i 'khor la ni 'di/ tshangs pa'i 'khor la ni 'di
336a3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched tu brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs
336a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sde dang / shin du rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'khor ji lta bu 'dus par gyur pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du
336a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur pa/ de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa ci 'dra ba dang / sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bu thos par bya dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par
336a6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyang chos bstan pa de gcig nges pa'i tshig gnod par gyur pa yang med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod
336a7(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa bden pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 'jug go/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'jam par 'byung / yid tu 'ong ba dang / yid dga' ba dang / dag pa dang / dri ma
336a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / shes par bya bar 'os pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang bde ba skyed pa
336b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / gsal zhing 'thad pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / se ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang / sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i glu'i dbyangs dang /
336b2(dkon brtsegs): ka la ping ka'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad tu grags
336b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs
336b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ /de la 'di skad ces
336b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su/ /'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te/ /tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni phun sum tshogs/ /de yi dbyangs ni byams dang ldan/ /snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung / /btang snyoms dang ni dga' ldan pa/ /
336b6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung / /srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags me/ /zhe sdang dug ni zhi byed cing / /gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/ /phun sum tshogs dbyangs 'di 'dra'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na/ /mir gyur pa yi
336b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ni mtha' yas pa/ /kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs pa/ /dbyangs 'di thos na rjes su rtogs par 'gyur/ /sa bla dang ni de bzhin bar snang lha/ /de dag ci 'dra'i skad la 'jug pa ltar/ /de phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab zhugs te/ /rnam par
336b8(dkon brtsegs): des thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni/ /rkang mdas dag dang rkang pa med pa rnams/ /thams cad la ni de yi sgra dbyangs 'jug /bskul nas rab tu 'chos shing tshar gcod byed/ /stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa/ /tha ma dang ni
337a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bring dang de bzhin rab/ /de dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de sgrog ste/ /'dul ba'i sems can thar pa reg par byed/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog ste/ /gzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin/ /mnyam par bzhag
337a2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chang / /sems can thos na nyon mongs zhi bar byed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun sgra/ /sbyin thos tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa dag /mtha' yas sgra ni sems can thos
337a3(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra'o/ /dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa/ /de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yod med de/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dad cing / /de bzhin
337a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tshom med/ /shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid
337a5(dkon brtsegs): ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ thos na rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ /rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'du shes skyed ces na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chags
337a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas/ dad pas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
337a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ gang gA'i klung gis bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtswa dang / shing dang /
337a8(dkon brtsegs): yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yan chad ji snyed yod pa skyes bu la la zhig gis de dag gcig tu spungs te/ gcig tu spungs nas mes bsregs te tshig par
337b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas thal bar byas so/ /thal bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po gang na yod pa de dag tu blugs te/ lo stong du dkrugs kyang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
337b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes de dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po dang / de dag nas thal ba de dag blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag tu
337b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig gi rtsa ba dang / che ge mo zhing gi sdong po dang / che ge mo zhig
337b4(dkon brtsegs): gi yal ga dang / che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang / che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o/ /'di ni phyogs che ge mo zhig gi 'dab ma 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o/ /zhes rab tu 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
337b5(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o/ /zhes rab tu
337b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nas rgyas par byas te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o/ /de ltar mthu che'o/ /'di ltar dbang che bar grags
337b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa
337b8(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyangs shin du rtogs te/ de shin du rtogs
338a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems bskyed pa cig kyang chud mi za'o/ /shA ri'i bu khyod la dper bya ste/ 'di la skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes
338a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la tshe lo brgya pa lo brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa dang / 'di
338a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces kye gau ta ma bdag gis chu'i thigs pa 'di khyod la gdams kyis nams bdag la dgos par gyur pa de na slar byin cig ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te rgya
338a4(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen por bor nas de chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dres nas lhan cig tu mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /de nas skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang nga ga la ba der 'ongs te/ phyin nas
338a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gau ta ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de dgos kyis bdag la byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes de dang ldan
338a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te
338a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu de la slar byin no/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te/ de gang gi don du blta zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu skyes bu'i chu'i thigs pa de bzhin
338a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i lag tu bzhag pa yun ring mo zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dad/
338b1(dkon brtsegs): yid ches/ rab tu rtog cing de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs nas de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge
338b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba 'di mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/
338b3(dkon brtsegs): de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las sems gcig bskyed pa yang chud mi za'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
338b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par 'jug pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni
338b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ye shes ni gang lags/ rnam par shes pa ni gang lags/ shA ri'i bu 'di bzhi ni rnam par shes pa'i gnas te/ rnam par shes pa de la gnas so/ /
338b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa'i gzugs la nye bar song zhing gnas/ gzugs la dmigs/ gzugs la gnas/ dga' ba la bsten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam
338b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas/ tshor ba la dmigs/ tshor ba la gnas/ dga' ba la bstan pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar
338b8(dkon brtsegs): song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 'du shes la gnas/ dga' ba la bsten pas/ skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song
339a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas/ 'du byed la dmigs/ 'du byed la gnas/ dga' ba la bsten pas skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang
339a2(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i
339a3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi kham
339a4(dkon brtsegs): kun du dbye ba shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam
339a5(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa dang / lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par bya ba'i
339a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam par rig pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ste/ ye shes kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de ni
339a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes shes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa las skye'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni yid las byed pa las skye'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni yongs su rtog pa las skye ste/ de ni
339a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang 'dzin pa med pas snyems pa dang / dmigs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi rtog pa de ni ye shes shes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod
339b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa la gnas shing gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'dus ma byas la ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang
339b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang skye ba dang / 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la
339b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa/ 'di ni ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
339b4(dkon brtsegs): shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'dus shes skyed do/ /de nas bcom
339b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rtswa
339b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ /de dag skyes bu la las mer bsregs thal bar byas/ /lo ni brgya stong dag tu rgya mtshor dkrugs pa rnams/ /de 'dra ba yi stobs bcu ye shes phra mnga' bas/ /thal ba blangs
339b7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba dag la lung ston pa/ /zhing rnams rab 'byams dag gi shing rigs 'di/ /de tshig thal ba 'di zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ /'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams
339b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdul/ /thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te/ /de dag thams cad 'grang yang chags med the tshom med/ /de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes nam mkha'
340a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud/ /gang dag 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang gti mug ldan/ /spyod pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni/ /
340a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis blo nyams gang gis thar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen/ /'jig rten kun mchog stobs bcu rnams kyi ye shes ni/ /ji snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings su rab zhugs kyang / /'dren
340a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la rtog dang rnam par rtog mi 'byung / /bde gshegs sras po dad pa rgyal la dad par byed// // // // //
